recipes.ingredients: ["2 tablespoons butter", "1 medium onion, sliced and separated into rings", "4 slices cooked beef", "2 teaspoons vinegar", "1 tablespoon butter", "18 teaspoon thyme or 18 teaspoon tarragon or 18 teaspoon marjoram leaves"]
recipes.steps: ["Melt 2 tablespoons butter in 8-inch skillet; cook and stir onion until tender, about 5 minutes.", "Remove onion from skillet and keep warm.", "Add meat to skillet; brown quickly on both sides and sprinkle with vinegar.", "Mix 1 tablespoon butter and the thyme leaves.", "Arrange meat and onions on dinner plates; top meat with seasoned butter."]

recipes.ingredients: ["14 cups cooked beef, chopped Safeway 1 lb For $5.49 thru 02/09", "14 cups Cooked rice", "7 1/2 cups Kraft Sauce Works Dijon Bistro Sauce", "3 3/4 cups sun-dried tomatoes in oil, drained, chopped", "3 3/4 cups green onion, chopped", "60 slices Kraft Provolone Slices", "60 cups Shredded romaine lettuce", "60 flour tortilla (10 inch)"]
recipes.steps: ["MIX beef, rice, Bistro Sauce, sun-dried tomatoes and green onion; cover.", "Refrigerate at least 1 hour for flavours to blend.", "Place 1 slice cheese and 1 cup lettuce on bottom half of each tortilla; top with 1/2 cup beef mixture.", "FOLD sides of tortilla toward centre, roll tightly from bottom, cut diagonally in half to serve."]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 lbs stew meat", "6 potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks", "6 carrots, peeled and cut into chunks", "3 -4 stalks celery, sliced", "1 (15 ounce) can green beans (with juice)", "1 large onion, peeled and chopped", "1 (15 ounce) can tomatoes, with juice", "3 teaspoons salt", "pepper", "12 cup minute tapioca"]
recipes.steps: ["Preheat oven to 275F.", "Mix all together in a large roaster.", "Bake covered for 6 hours."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1/4 cup dry white wine", "1 tablespoon minced shallot", "1/4 teaspoon dried tarragon", "5 tablespoons butter, room temperature", "1 tablespoon minced fresh tarragon", "Olive oil", "2 12-ounce rib-eye steaks (each about 1 to 1 1/4 inches thick)"]
recipes.steps: ["Boil wine, shallot and dried tarragon in small saucepan until liquid evaporates, about 2 minutes.", "Cool completely.", "Mix butter and fresh tarragon into shallot mixture.", "Season with salt and pepper.", "Form butter mixture into log; wrap in plastic and chill until firm.", "(Can be made 3 days ahead.", "Keep chilled.)", "Cut butter into 1/3-inch-thick slices.", "Bring to room temperature before continuing.", "Brush large nonstick skillet with oil; heat over medium-high heat.", "Sprinkle steaks with salt and pepper; add to skillet.", "Cook to desired doneness, about 5 minutes per side for medium-rare.", "Overlap butter slices atop steaks and serve."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1/4 cup canola oil", "1/4 cup Meat Seasoning*", "2 tablespoons garlic, chopped", "2 tablespoons lemon juice, fresh", "2 pounds skirt steak, trimmed"]
recipes.steps: ["In a small bowl, mix together the oil, seasoning, garlic, and lemon juice.", "Rub the mixture on both sides of the meat, making sure to work it into the meat.", "Let the meat marinate at room temperature for at least 30 minutes but no longer than 45 minutes (if the day is very hot, dont leave the meat out for longer than 30 minutes).", "Prepare a hot fire in a charcoal or gas grill and oil the grill grates.", "Grill the steak for 3 to 5 minutes on each side, until done to the degree of doneness you prefer.", "Let the skirt steaks rest for 5 minutes before slicing to serve."]

recipes.dish_name: Beef With Green Onion Over Rice Recipe
recipes.ingredients: ["1/2 lb (225g) beef, sliced", "2 c. Green onion, cut in 2\" (5cm) sections", "1 c. Fresh mushrooms", "1/2 c. Bamboo shoots, thinly sliced", "3 Tbsp. Soy sauce", "2 tsp Sugar", "1 Tbsp. Cooking wine or possibly sherry", "2 c. Cooked rice"]
recipes.steps: ["1.", "Heat 2 Tbsp.", "oil in a preheated wok.", "Add in the white part of the green onion, fry till fragrant, then add in the other ingredients in mix 1.", "Stir-fry briefly, then remove from wok.", "2.", "Heat another 3 Tbsp.", "of oil in the wok, add in the beef, and stir-fry till it changes colour.", "Add in mix 2, stir-fry briefly, then add in mix 1, and stir-fry briefly again.", "Remove from wok.", "3.", "Put half of rice onto each of two serving plates, and top with the beef with green onion.", "Other vegetables may be served as an accompaniment to this dish."]

recipes.dish_name: Teen Age Boy Inexpensive and Easy Lunch/Dinner - Seasoned Beef
recipes.ingredients: ["1 lb ground beef or 1 lb turkey", "14 cup margarine or 14 cup butter", "5 cups water", "1 cup cheddar cheese (optional)", "one box Rice-A-Roni (beef flavor, family size)"]
recipes.steps: ["In a 4-6 quart skillet or pot cook 1 pound ground beef or turkey until cooked and no longer pink.", "drain meat.", "Sitir in rice-vermicelli mix, 1/4 cup margarine or butter, 5 cups water and special seasonings.", "bring to a boil.", "cover and reduce heat to medium low and simmer 20-25 minutes or until rice is tender.", "OPTIONAL: top with 1 cup cheddar cheese.", "OPTIONAL: stir in 1 1/2 cups corn during the last 3 minutes of simmering and/or OPTIONAL.", "stir in 1 1/2 cups chunky salsa just before serving."]

recipes.dish_name: Beef Brain Sauteed In Spiced Sauce (Semur Otak) Recipe
recipes.ingredients: ["1 lb beef brains", "2 Tbsp. minced onion", "2 Tbsp. butter", "3/4 c. water", "1 Tbsp. sweet soy sauce", "1 tsp tomato ketchup", "1 tsp salt", "1/2 tsp grnd cloves", "1/4 tsp nutmeg", "1/4 tsp freshly-grnd white pepper"]
recipes.steps: ["Steam the brains over warm water for ten min in a Chinese-style steamer.", "Allow to cold, and slice into 8 to 10 pcs.", "Fry the onion in the butter till light golden brown.", "Add in the water, sweet soy sauce, tomato ketchup, salt, cloves, nutmeg and pepper.", "Stir well.", "Add in the brain slices, and baste several times.", "Cover the saucepan, and cook over medium heat for about ten ininutes, or possibly till the sauce thickens.", "This recipe yields 6 to 8 servings, with other dishes."]

recipes.dish_name: Macaroni And Cheddar Beef Bake Recipe
recipes.ingredients: ["1 pkg. macaroni and cheese (Leonardo's)", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "1/2 c. lowfat milk", "1 pound grnd beef", "2 tbsp. onion, minced"]
recipes.steps: ["Cook macaroni.", "Drain.", "Mix cheese mix.", "Brown grnd beef and onion in fry pan.", "Drain off excess fat.", "Combine thoroughly remaining ingredients with beef mix and macaroni dinner.", "Season to taste and place in 2 qt buttered casserole.", "Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 25 min."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 tablespoon olive oil", "1 lb beef tips, cubed", "13 cup wine", "1 large sweet onion, diced", "2 portabella mushrooms, cut into strips", "4 fingerling potatoes, cubed", "2 large carrots, diced", "2 large parsnips, diced", "3 celery ribs, diced", "2 large garlic cloves, finely chopped", "4 cups beef broth or 4 cups stock", "12 cup fresh basil, torn", "salt and pepper"]
recipes.steps: ["In a large stock pot heat heat olive oil and add beef tips.", "Cook until it is ready, and then set aside the meat.", "Add onions and garlic and saute for five minutes.", "Add red wine to deglaze the bottom of the pan.", "Add the remaining vegetables and cook until soft.", "Season with salt and pepper Put the beef back into the pot and pour in the beef broth (for a more vegetable flavour use vegetable stock, or put 2 cups beef stock and 2 cups vegetable stock).", "Cook for five hours.", "In the last ten to twenty minutes, add the basil.", "Serve warm."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 tbsp butter", "2 tbsp chopped white onion", "2 cup beef stock or canned beef broth", "1/4 tsp black cracked pepper", "1 clove pressed garlic", "2 tbsp whiskey", "1 chopped green onion", "1 tsp cornstarch", "1 tbsp water"]
recipes.steps: ["Saute the white onions in the butter over high heat.", "In about 3 minutes the onions will begin to turn brown.", "Add 1 cup of the beef stock to the onions.", "Also add the pepper and garlic at this time.", "Continue to simmer over medium high heat until the sauce has reduced by about half.", "Add the whiskey, green onion, and remaining 1 cup of beef stock to the sauce and let it simmer over low heat while you prepare the steaks.", "When your steaks are just about done, combine the cornstarch with the tablespoon of water in a small bowl.", "Stir just until the cornstarch dissolves.", "Remove the whiskey sauce from the heat and add the cornstarch to it.", "Put the sauce back on the heat and continue to cook on low until the sauce has thickened to the consistency you desire.", "Serve the steak covered with the sauce.", "Enjoy!"]

recipes.ingredients: ["4 sirloin (New York) strip or ribeye steaks, 6 to 8 ounces each, or 2 larger steaks", "1/2 cup sake or slightly sweet white wine, like a German Kabinett or Spatlese", "1/3 cup mirin or 2 tablespoons honey mixed with 2 tablespoons water", "2 tablespoons sugar", "1/3 cup soy sauce"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat a large heavy skillet over high heat for about 3 minutes, then add the steaks.", "Brown quickly on both sides, not more than 2 minutes per side.", "Transfer the meat to a plate and turn off the heat for a minute or two.", "Turn the heat to medium, add the sake, and cook, stirring, to loosen any bits of meat adhering to the bottom of the pan.", "Add the mirin, sugar, and soy sauce.", "Stir to blend and, when the mixture is producing lively bubbles, return the meat to the pan.", "Cook, turning the meat in the sauce, until it becomes thick and sticky, more of a glaze than a liquid; this will take only 5 minutes or so.", "By that time the steaks should be rare to medium-rare (if youre not sure, cut into a piece).", "Continue to cook if necessary, adding a spoonful or two of water if the sauce threatens to burn.", "Serve immediately."]

recipes.dish_name: Beer Braised Beef With Italian Salsa Verde
recipes.ingredients: ["1 cup chopped mint", "23 cup chopped dill", "13 cup chopped parsley", "14 cup minced shallot", "3 tablespoons olive oil", "salt and pepper", "1 lb beef stew meat", "2 tablespoons olive oil", "13 cup chopped onion", "1 cup beef broth", "12 ounces Guinness stout"]
recipes.steps: ["Combine salsa ingredients and chill for one hour.", "Season beef with salt and pepper and brown in 1 tbl.", "olive oil.", "Remove beef from pan and saute onion in 1 tbl olive oil.", "Add beef back to pan, along with broth and beer.", "Bring to a boil.", "Reduce heat to low and simmer 90 minutes or until tender.", "Shred with a fork."]

recipes.dish_name: Simple Broiled Flank Steak with Herb Oil
recipes.ingredients: ["1/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil", "1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley", "2 tablespoons red wine vinegar", "1 clove garlic, minced", "Pinch of crushed red pepper flakes", "Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper", "One 1 1/2- to 2-pound flank steak"]
recipes.steps: ["Position an oven rack 5 to 6 inches from the broiler unit, and preheat the broiler.", "Line a broiler pan or baking sheet with foil, and set the broiler insert on top of the broiler pan if using.", "Place the pan on the oven rack, and preheat until hot, about 5 minutes.", "Meanwhile, mix together 1/4 cup of the oil, parsley, vinegar, garlic, pepper flakes, 1/2 teaspoon salt and a few grinds of pepper in a small bowl.", "Cover the herb oil, and set aside until ready to serve.", "Stir together the remaining 2 tablespoons oil, 2 teaspoons salt and 1 teaspoon pepper in a small bowl.", "Rub the mixture on both sides of the steak.", "Carefully remove the broiler pan from the oven, put the steak in the center and broil (without turning) until nicely browned and firm, with some give when pressed in the thickest part, 6 to 8 minutes for medium-rare.", "Let the steak rest for 10 minutes.", "Slice thinly against the grain, and serve with the herb oil."]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 avocado", "1 chopped onion", "2 tomatoes", "500 grams ground beef", "6 tortillas", "4 tbsp chutney", "1 dash chilli", "1 pinch salt", "1 pinch ground black pepper"]
recipes.steps: ["Fry onions over a medium heat in a frying pan, then add your ground beef.", "Fry for 15 min and add salt and pepper to taste, chillies and chutney.", "Turn up the heat for 5min for flavours to infuse and take off heat to rest.", "Cut tomatoes, avocado and layer them into your tortilla wraps.", "Lastly, close the tortillas and your ready toe eat!", "Enjoy!"]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 1/4 lb beef tripe cleaned, washed well", "1/2 lb beef boiled in", "5 c. water till tender and cut in 1/4\" cubes (optional)", "12 c. water", "4 c. beef broth", "1 x inch ginger root peeled, and sliced lengthwise", "4 x garlic cloves peeled and sliced", "1 Tbsp. distilled white vinegar", "6 ounce giant white radish peeled, and diced in 1/2\" cubes", "5 sprg celery leaf minced", "1 Tbsp. fried shallots"]
recipes.steps: ["Rinse tripe well under running water till very clean.", "Bring water to a boil in a stockpot, add in tripe and simmer till soft (approximately 2 hrs).", "Strain water and cold tripe in ice water.", "Cut in pcs approximately 1 inch by 1/2 inch.", "Bring beef stock, ginger, garlic and vinegar to a boil in a large stockpot.", "Add in tripe, radish, and beef cubes (optional).", "Simmer till vegetables are soft.", "Garnish with celery leaf and fried shallots.", "This recipe yields 4 to 5 servings."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 large fat trimmed Topside roast beef joint", "1/2 cup soy sauce", "3 tbsp oyster sauce", "3 tbsp honey", "2 tbsp worcestershire sauce", "5 clove FINELY chopped garlic", "2 hot chillis FINELY chopped", "1 cayenne pepper", "1 dash sweet chilli sauce", "1 Oxo beef stock cube", "1 Himalayan pink salt", "1 mixed ground pepper", "1 dash sesame oil", "1 mixed herbs"]
recipes.steps: ["Remove all fat from beef (as much as possible)", "Slice beef THINLY to required size - I like mine to be about 1\" wide and 2 - 3\" long", "In a bowl mix all other ingredients together - adjust measurements to suit your taste (ie amount of chilli or cayenne pepper used)", "Note that flavours do not traditionally go together but the final result is delicious", "Add sliced beef and mix thoroughly until all meat is coated", "Cover bowl in Clingfilm and keep in fridge for a minimum of three hours/overnight is best to infuse flavour into the meat", "Place beef on trays of dehydrator do not overcrowd to allow air to flow and stack trays", "Setting should be for meat and dehydrate overnight for 12 - 16 hours....I like a touch of moisture still in my jerky so that it is a little juicy but try a piece after 12 hours to see what you prefer", "Store in an airtight container in the fridge - if your friends and family are like mine you won't have much left to store once it is ready to eat"]

recipes.ingredients: ["7 ORE-IDA Steak Fries (about 3 oz.)", "2 Tbsp. KRAFT 2% Milk Shredded Cheddar Cheese", "1/4 cup frozen chopped broccoli, cooked", "2 Tbsp. KRAFT Lite Ranch Dressing"]
recipes.steps: ["Bake steak fries as directed on package.", "Place steak fries on plate; top with cheese and broccoli.", "Drizzle with dressing."]

recipes.ingredients: ["4 Tbsp. Oil", "18 ounce Beef roast,not to lean", "1 x Garlic Clove", "2 x Onions", "2 tsp Paprika Warm", "1 x Pepper, red", "1 x Pepper, green", "9 ounce Carrots", "1 x Leek", "2 quart Broth, clear", "2 c. Rice", "2 can Corn,whole cernel", "1/2 tsp Salt", "1 tsp Pepper", "1 bn Parsley,minced"]
recipes.steps: ["1.Let the oil get warm in a big pot; cut the meat into cubes and brown in the oil for about 20 min.", "2.In the meantime; peel onion and clove and minced finely.", "3.Clean the leek, carrots and the peppers and dice finely.", "4.Add in the vegetables to meat and saute/fry shortly and pour in the broth.", "Let come to a boil, and add in the rice and let it all simmer 20 min.", "5.Add in the corn and let simmer for another 10 min.", "Season to taste and add in the parsley.Serve with a hearty bread."]

recipes.ingredients: ["3 lbs (1.4 kg). round steak", "3 onions, sliced", "2 cloves garlic, finely chopped", "3 tbsp (45 ml) finely chopped parsley", "1/4 tsp (1 ml). salt", "freshly ground pepper", "1/8 tsp (1 ml). nutmeg", "2 tbsp (30 ml). quick cooking tapioca", "1/2 cup (125 ml) beer"]
recipes.steps: ["Place the steak in a crockpot.", "Cover with onions, garlic and parsley.", "Season with salt, pepper and nutmeg.", "Stir tapioca into beer and pour down the side of pot.", "Cover and cook on low temperature for 8 to 10 hours."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 12 lbs round steaks or 1 12 lbs flank steaks or 1 12 lbs top sirloin steaks", "13 cup soy sauce", "13 cup chili sauce", "14 cup water", "1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce", "14 teaspoon pepper", "14 teaspoon garlic powder", "18 teaspoon chili powder", "1 tablespoon parsley", "1 teaspoon oregano", "18 teaspoon dry mustard"]
recipes.steps: ["Mix marinade ingredients in a large ziploc bag.", "Add steak, making sure to coat both sides with the marinade.", "Refrigerate and marinate for 3-4 hours.", "Drain marinade.", "Grill or broil to desired doneness."]

recipes.ingredients: ["3/4 lb Ground beef", "3 onion, chopped", "2 tbsp paprika", "3 clove garlic", "1 tsp salt", "2 tbsp ground black pepper", "2 1/4 cup sour cream", "2 pizza crusts", "2 cup shredded mozzarella cheese", "1 1/4 cup tomato sauce"]
recipes.steps: ["Brown beef with chopped onions and add dry spices.", "Simmer mixture for 8 to 10 minutes.", "Min in sour cream and tomato sauce and simmer until mixture is consistent.", "Preheat oven to 400F.", "Mound sauce mixture until it is 1 1/2 inches from the edge of the crist.", "Apply pressure With spatula until mixture is 3/4 inch from the crust edge.", "Sprinkle mozzarella cheese over the pizza to taste.", "Bake for 10-15 minutes.", "Repeat with second crust."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 12 lbs hamburger", "1 (10 3/4 ounce) can cream of mushroom soup", "14 cup onion, chopped", "12 cup breadcrumbs", "1 egg, beaten", "12 teaspoon salt", "18 teaspoon pepper", "13 cup water"]
recipes.steps: ["Mix hamburer with 1/4 cup of the soup and add onions, bread crumbs, egg, salt & pepper.", "Be sure to mix thoroughly.", "Shape into 6 salisbury steaks and place in baking dish.", "Bake 350F for 30 minutes.", "Remove from oven and spoon off excess grease.", "Now combine remaining soup with water and pour over steaks.", "Return to oven and bake an additional 10 minutes."]

recipes.dish_name: Roast-Beef Salad with Creamy Horseradish Dressing
recipes.ingredients: ["1/3 cup mayonnaise", "1/3 cup sour cream", "3 tablespoons drained bottled horseradish", "1 teaspoon red- or white-wine vinegar", "1/4 teaspoon fresh-ground black pepper", "3/4 teaspoon salt", "1 large head escarole (about 1 1/2 pounds), torn into bite-size pieces (about 4 quarts)", "1/4 pound mushrooms, sliced thin", "1 small red onion, sliced thin", "1/2 pound sliced roast beef, cut into approximately 1 1/2-by-1/2-inch strips"]
recipes.steps: ["In a medium glass or stainless-steel bowl, whisk together the mayonnaise, sour cream, horseradish, vinegar, pepper, and 1/2 teaspoon of the salt until smooth.", "In a large bowl, toss the escarole with the mushrooms, onion, roast beef, the remaining 1/4 teaspoon salt, and all but 2 tablespoons of the dressing.", "Serve the salad with the remaining dressing drizzled over the top."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 large onion, quartered", "2 stalks celery, sliced", "12 green pepper, seeded and cubed", "2 tablespoons oil", "1 12 lbs goulash meat, cut into 1 1/2 inch chunks", "salt and pepper", "1 bay leaf, crumbled", "7 cups water", "2 potatoes, cubed", "2 carrots, thickly sliced", "2 tablespoons flour"]
recipes.steps: ["Saute onion, celery, and green pepper in oil until soft.", "Add goulash meat and sear on all sides (brown meat on all sides).", "Cover and cook over low hear for about 30 minutes.", "Add remaining ingredients except for flour.", "Cover and simmer for 1 1/2 hours.", "Dissolve flour in 1/4 cup of cold water, and stir into simmering mixture.", "Cook for 2 more minutes.", "Variation: Tofu stew soup: In place of 1 onion, saute 3 large diced onions in 3-4 tablespoons of oil.", "In place of goulash meat, add 1 pound of cubed tofu."]

recipes.dish_name: Beef Stroganoff with Mushrooms and Peppers
recipes.ingredients: ["4 tsp. oil, divided", "1 lb. (450 g) beef sirloin steak, cut into thin strips", "1/2 cup finely chopped onions King Sooper's 1 lb For $0.99 thru 02/09", "1/2 lb. (225 g) cremini mushrooms, sliced", "1/2 green pepper, cut into thin strips", "1/3 cup 25%-less-sodium beef broth", "1/2 cup Philadelphia Herb & Garlic Cream Cheese Product", "2 tsp. Dijon mustard"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat 2 tsp.", "oil in large skillet on medium-high heat.", "Add meat; cook 2 to 3 min.", "or until evenly browned, stirring frequently.", "Remove meat from skillet; cover to keep warm.", "Add remaining oil and onions to skillet; cook on medium heat 3 min.", "or until onions are crisp-tender, stirring occasionally.", "Stir in mushrooms and peppers; cook 5 min., stirring occasionally.", "Stir in broth; bring to boil.", "Add cream cheese product and mustard; cook and stir on medium heat 1 to 2 min.", "or until cream cheese is melted.", "Stir in meat; cook 2 to 3 min.", "or until heated through."]

recipes.dish_name: Beef Steak in Refreshing Japanese Marinade
recipes.ingredients: ["1 Beef Steak", "1 Onion", "1 Salt and pepper", "100 ml A Bonito dashi stock", "100 ml (A) Soy sauce", "1/2 (A) Lemon juice"]
recipes.steps: ["Use a meat hammer or the back of a knife to pound the meat several times.", "Reform the expanded meat to its former shape, and flavor both sides with salt and pepper.", "Heat an oiled frying pan until it starts to smoke, then add the meat from Step 1.", "Cook both sides until crispy, about medium rare!", "Add the A ingredients to a plastic bag, then add the steak from Step 2 while it's hot to let the flavors soak in.", "Slice the onions, and add to a bowl with some salt (not listed).", "Pour in boiling water and let sit for a minute, then pour out the water and press down on the onions.", "Add the onions to the bag from Step 3, close and let the marinade for at least an hour and it's complete.", "Serve together with plenty of vegetables!"]

recipes.dish_name: Spaghetti with Beef and Mushroom Sauce
recipes.ingredients: ["1 lb spaghetti", "1 lb lean ground beef", "1 (14 1/2 ounce) can whole tomatoes, undrained", "1 (12 ounce) can tomato paste", "12 lb mushroom, sliced", "1 cup water", "1 tablespoon crushed dried basil", "1 clove garlic, peeled and chopped", "1 teaspoon italian seasoning", "1 teaspoon dried oregano"]
recipes.steps: ["Cook spaghetti according to package directions.", "Drain, cover and set aside.", "Brown beef in large skillet, drain.", "Add whole tomatoes, tomato paste, mushrooms, water, basil and garlic.", "Stir in Italian seasoning and oregano.", "Cover and simmer for 15-20 mins.", "Stirring often.", "Remove from heat and ladle over spaghetti, toss to mix evenly."]

recipes.dish_name: Pork Chop with Cider Gravy, Sauteed Apples, and Onions
recipes.ingredients: ["1 (1-inch-thick) bone-in pork chop", "Salt and pepper", "1 tablespoon EVOO (extra-virgin olive oil)", "1 small onion, yellow or red, thinly sliced", "1 Gala or Golden Delicious apple,thinly sliced", "2 to 3 sprigs of fresh thyme, leaves finely chopped", "1/2 lemon", "1 tablespoon butter", "1 tablespoon all-purpose flour", "1/2 cup cloudy apple cider", "1/2 cup chicken stock", "1 corn muffin, split, buttered, and toasted"]
recipes.steps: ["Season the chop with salt and pepper.", "Heat 1/2 tablespoon of the EVOO in a medium skillet over medium-high heat.", "Cook the chop until golden, 3 to 4 minutes per side, tenting loosely with foil once you turn the chop.", "Remove the cooked chop to a plate and cover to keep warm.", "Add the remaining EVOO and the onions and apples.", "Season with salt, pepper, and the thyme and cook until just tender, 5 to 6 minutes, stirring occasionally.", "Douse with juice of the 1/2 lemon and remove to the plate with the chop.", "Add 1 tablespoon of the butter to the skillet and when it melts, whisk in the flour.", "Cook for 1 minute, stirring, then whisk in the cider and stock.", "Season the gravy with salt and pepper.", "Cook over medium-low heat for 3 to 4 minutes to thicken.", "Serve the chop covered with apples and onions, the gravy poured down over the top, and the muffin alongside."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 c. rice", "1 pkg. onion soup mix", "4 pork chops", "1 c. water", "Extra onions, if you like"]
recipes.steps: ["Put rice and water in baking dish.", "Stir in onion soup and extra onion.", "Place meat on top.", "Cover with foil.", "Bake at 350 degrees for 1 1/4 hrs.", "Serves 4.", "I brown chops slightly."]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 boneless pork loin chops (1 1/2 inch thick)", "14 teaspoon cracked black pepper", "14 teaspoon ground nutmeg", "2 slices turkey bacon (or bacon)", "3 cups coleslaw mix", "1 cup apple, coarsely chopped", "13 cup cider vinegar", "13 cup apple juice", "1 tablespoon honey", "2 teaspoons honey mustard", "1 teaspoon caraway seed"]
recipes.steps: ["Sprinkle pork with pepper and nutmeg.", "Place meat on the unheated rack of broiler pan.", "Broil 4 to 5 inches from the heat for 18 to 25 minutes or until no pink remains and juices run clear, turning the meat once during cooking.", "Meanwhile, in a large bowl combine coleslaw mix and apple, set aside.", "In a medium skillet cook bacon slices until crisp.", "Drain and crumble bacon, set aside.", "Add vinegar, apple juice, honey, mustard and craway seed to skillet.", "Bring to boiling.", "Pour over coleslaw mixture; add crumbled bacon.", "Toss to mix.", "Arrange coleslaw mixture on individual serving plates.", "Cut pork into 1/4 inch thick slices.", "Arrange pork slices on coleslaw mixture.", "Garnish with additional apple slices if so desired."]

recipes.ingredients: ["3 cups Hot water", "1 cup Unsalted butter", "2 qt. STOVE TOP Chicken Flavored Stuffing Mix", "1 qt. Canned mandarin oranges, drained", "48 each OSCAR MAYER Ham Stacks Smoked Ham Steak and Water Product 3 oz. Slice", "2 cups BULL'S-EYE Original Barbecue Sauce"]
recipes.steps: ["Mix hot water and butter.", "Add Stuffing Crumbs and orange segments; stir to moisten.", "Let stand 5 minutes.", "Place ham steaks in full-size hotel pan (or use half size hotel pan for trial recipe).", "Brush each steak with about 1 Tbsp.", "barbecue sauce; top with 1/3 cup of the stuffing mixture.", "Bake at 400F for 20 minutes or until thoroughly heated."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1/2 cup chopped PLANTERS Walnuts", "1/4 cup apricot preserves", "1/4 cup chopped onion King Sooper's 1 lb For $0.99 thru 02/09", "1/4 cup chopped dried apricots", "1 lb. boneless pork chops, 1/2 to 3/4 inch thick, trimmed of any visible fat Safeway 1 lb For $1.99 thru 02/09"]
recipes.steps: ["Preheat broiler.", "Mix walnuts, preserves, onion and apricots.", "Broil chops, 3 to 5 inches from heat, 10 minutes; turn.", "Broil an additional 5 to 7 minutes or until chops are almost cooked through.", "Spoon walnut mixture evenly over chops.", "Continue broiling 3 minutes or until walnuts are lightly toasted and chops are cooked through."]

recipes.dish_name: Brandy Sauce for a Large Ham - Cognacsauce til Kold Skinke
recipes.ingredients: ["1 pint port wine", "1 pint ham stock", "1 cup tomato sauce", "1 tablespoon cornstarch", "2 tablespoons cold water", "12 pint brandy"]
recipes.steps: ["Let wine, stock and tomato juice come to a boil.", "Add the cornstarch moistened with cold water and cook, stirring frequently, until smooth, thick and at the boiling point.", "Add the brandy just before removing heat."]

recipes.ingredients: ["4 ripe plums (about 3/4 lbs)", "2 tablespoons hoisin sauce", "2 tablespoons soy sauce", "1 teaspoon pepper", "1 tablespoon sesame oil", "2 teaspoons fresh ginger, minced", "2 tablespoons orange juice", "1 tablespoon lemon juice", "4 (3/4 lb) pork tenderloin"]
recipes.steps: ["Cut plums in quarters and remove seeds.", "In a small saucepan, cook plums with 2 tablespoons cold water until soft and mushy, about 15 minutes.", "Let cool.", "Add hoisin sauce, soy sauce, pepper, sesame oil, ginger, orange juice, lemon juice, and 1/4 cup of water, stir to blend marinade well.", "Trim Pork tenderloin, if necessary.", "Place in a roasting pan and coat with marinade.", "Cover pan with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 3 hours.", "Preheat oven to 400F.", "Roast pork in marinade, uncovered, until pork is white throughout, 30-35 minutes.", "Remove meat to a carving board, slice, and arrange on a platter.", "Spoon pan juices over meat.", "Serve warm or at room temperature."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 teaspoon Dried Rubbed Sage", "1/2 teaspoons Salt", "1/4 teaspoons Black Pepper", "1 pound Boneless Center Cut Loin Pork Chops (4 Chops, 1/2 Inch Thick)", "1/2 teaspoons Vegetable Oil", "4 cups Peeled, Granny Smith Apples Sliced Into 1/2 Slices (to Get 4 Cups You'll Need About 4 Medium Apples)", "1 Tablespoon Brown Sugar", "1 teaspoon Fresh Lemon Juice", "1/2 teaspoons Ground Cinnamon", "1 dash Salt", "1 Tablespoon Butter", "12 ounces, weight Egg Noodles", "1- 1/2 Tablespoon Butter", "2 teaspoons Black Poppy Seeds"]
recipes.steps: ["Combine first 3 ingredients and sprinkle over the four pork chops.", "Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat.", "Add the pork chops; cook 3 minutes on each side or until done.", "Remove pork from pan and cover with foil to keep warm.", "In a medium sized bowl, toss the apples in the brown sugar, lemon juice, ground cinnamon and a dash of salt.", "In a pan, melt the butter over medium heat and add the apple mixture.", "Cook 5 minutes or until apples are tender, stirring frequently.", "Optional: I like to serve the apples and pork chops with buttered poppy seed noodles.", "I cook egg noodles according to the package directions, but you could use whatever noodles youd like.", "Then I add the butter and black poppy seeds to the cooked noodles."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 quart. squash (cooked and mashed)", "1 pound sausage", "1 sm. onion (finely minced or possibly grated)", "1/4 teaspoon pepper", "1 1/2 c. bread crumbs", "1 teaspoon salt"]
recipes.steps: ["Mash sausage with fork and fry till cooked but not brown.", "Drain off fat.", "Add in grated onion, bread crumbs, salt and pepper.", "Spread squash in a casserole dish and top with sausage mix.", "Bake for 30 min at 375 degrees."]

recipes.dish_name: Pork Chop And Rice Bake (Microwave) Recipe
recipes.ingredients: ["1/2 c. long grain rice", "1/2 c. water", "Salt and pepper", "4 (1 1/2 lbs.) pork chops", "1 med. onion, sliced", "1 (10 1/2 ounce.) can golden brown mushroom soup"]
recipes.steps: ["In 2-qt casserole arrange rice proportionately over bottom.", "Cover with water, salt and pepper to taste.", "Arrange pork chops with meaty portions towards outside edges over rice.", "Salt and pepper.", "Arrange sliced onion rings proportionately over chops.", "Spoon soup over top of this.", "Microwave at 50% covered, 45 min.", "If you like, add in 2 more chops and an additional 15 min cooking time."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 tbsp season salt", "1 tbsp garlic powder", "1 tbsp onion powder", "2 tbsp sage", "2 tbsp molasses", "1 tbsp pepper", "1 cup water", "2 tbsp oil", "8 lb pork shoulder butt"]
recipes.steps: ["mix dry and wet ingredients together in crock pot", "place pork shoulder in crock on low for 8 hours to cook", "after pork falls off bone remove from crock and discard water", "put pork in deep flat bottom cooking tray and shred with tongs or butcher knife", "once shredded to satisfaction place on large roll and top With favorite BBQ sauce"]

recipes.ingredients: ["3 tablespoons packed light brown sugar", "2 garlic cloves, minced", "2 teaspoons fresh thyme", "3 tablespoons dried ancho chile powder", "fresh ground black pepper", "14 teaspoon cayenne pepper", "3 cups apple cider", "3 tablespoons ketchup", "2 tablespoons Dijon mustard", "2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce"]
recipes.steps: ["Make shallow cuts between the ribs on the bone side with a sharp knife, piercing just the membrane.", "Mix 1 tbls salt, the brown sugar, garlic, thyme, chili powder, 1/4 tsp black pepper and the cayenne in a bowl.", "Rub the spice mixture evenly over the ribs.", "Place the ribs on a rack in a roasting pan, loosely cover and refrigerate at least 4 hours or overnight.", "Meanwhile, combine the cider, ketchup, mustard and worcestershire sauce in a saucepan over medium heat and simmer until reduced to about 2 cups, abotu 30 minutes.", "Cover and set aside.", "Preheat grill to low heat on one side.", "Cook the ribs bone-side down on the cooler side of the grill, covered, until tender, about 2 hours and 30 minutes.", "Continue to cook, uncovering every 10 minutes to baste with sauce, until the ribs are glazed, about 40 more minutes.", "Remove from frill and cut into pieces."]

recipes.ingredients: ["4 slices OSCAR MAYER Center Cut Bacon, chopped", "1 Tbsp. butter", "1 small red onion, thinly sliced", "2 lb. Brussels sprouts, trimmed, halved", "3/4 cup apple cider", "1/4 cup sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg", "1/4 tsp. freshly ground black pepper", "1/4 cup PLANTERS Sliced Almonds, toasted"]
recipes.steps: ["Cook and stir bacon in large skillet on medium heat until crisp.", "Remove bacon from skillet with slotted spoon; drain on paper towels.", "Discard all but 1 Tbsp.", "drippings from skillet.", "Add butter, onions and Brussels sprouts to drippings in skillet; cook and stir on medium-high heat 1 to 2 min.", "or until Brussels sprouts are lightly browned.", "Mix next 4 ingredients until blended; pour over sprouts.", "Cook 5 min.", "or until liquid is cooked off and sprouts are evenly glazed, stirring occasionally.", "Stir in bacon.", "Spoon sprouts into bowl; top with nuts."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 lb (.5 kg). ground pork", "2 lbs (.9 kg). ground ham", "1 cup (225 ml) bread crumbs", "1 egg", "1/4 tsp (1 ml). pepper", "3/4 cup (175 ml) milk", "1/4 cup (60 ml) catsup", "3/4 cup (175 ml) brown sugar", "1/2 cup (125 ml) water", "1 tsp (5 ml). dry mustard", "1/2 cup (125 ml) vinegar"]
recipes.steps: ["Preheat oven to 350 degrees (175 C.).", "Combine loaf ingredients.", "Put into loaf pan.", "Combine glaze ingredients.", "Pour over loaf.", "Bake about for 1 1/4 to 1 1/2 hours.", "ENJOY~~"]

recipes.ingredients: ["1/4 cup KRAFT Mayo Horseradish-Dijon Flavored Reduced Fat Mayonnaise", "1/4 cup chopped red onions", "1-1/2 cups coleslaw blend (cabbage slaw mix)", "8 slices whole wheat bread", "4 lettuce leaves", "1 pkg. (9 oz.) OSCAR MAYER Deli Fresh Honey Ham"]
recipes.steps: ["Mix mayonnaise and onions in medium bowl.", "Add coleslaw blend; toss to coat.", "Fill bread slices with lettuce, ham and coleslaw to make 4 sandwiches."]

recipes.ingredients: ["3 oz Applewood smoked bacon sliced 1/2inch pieces", "1 small Yellow onion, chopped", "2 clove Garlic, minced", "3 oz Smoked ham, cut into 1/2inch pieces", "2 cup Chicken broth", "2 lb Collard greens, stems and thick center ribs removed, leaves coarsely chopped", "1/2 tsp Salt"]
recipes.steps: ["Cool bacon in large pot set over medium heat.", "Once fat renders but before bacon becomes crispy add onions and cook, stirring occasionally, until translucent, about 3 minutes.", "Add garlic and ham to pot and continue cooking, 1 minute.", "Add chicken broth and bring to boil, scraping brown bits from bottom of pot.", "Add collard greens and salt to pot and cook uncovered, stirring occasionally, until greens are tender and most of liquid has evaporated.", "About 25-30 minutes."]

recipes.dish_name: Smoked Jalapeno Poppers with Bacon, Apple and Brie
recipes.ingredients: ["14 whole Fresh Jalapenos", "8 ounces, weight Brie Cheese", "10 strips Bacon, Cut Into Thirds", "1/2 Fresh Granny Smith Apple, Cored And Cut Into 18 Inch Thin Slices"]
recipes.steps: ["Note if you want to smoke this you will also need wood for the smoker as well as a disposable aluminum foil pan (big enough to fit all of the peppers into).", "I use fruit wood (apple, cherry, etc).", "Wash and dry jalapenos, cut them in half lengthwise and scoop out the seeds and vein from the inside with a spoon or butter knife.", "Take small slices of the Brie cheese and mold it into the pepper halves, then wrap one bacon piece around each pepper.", "Set aside.", "Prepare a smoker, using fruit wood (apple, cherry, etc) and get temperature up to 225 F. Place prepared poppers in an aluminum foil pan and place on the smoker grill rack.", "Smoke poppers for 2 hours.", "Place apple slices on a serving platter and place one smoked jalapeno popper on top of each apple slice.", "Enjoy!"]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 tbsp. vegetable oil", "2 Large eggs, scrambled", "1/2 c. minced onion", "1/2 c. minced green pepper", "2 c. cubed ham", "Dash garlic pwdr", "Pepper to taste", "2 c. cooked rice", "2 or possibly more slices bacon, fried & crumbled", "2 tbsp. soy sauce"]
recipes.steps: ["Pour oil around top of preheated wok, coating sides.", "Allow to heat at medium high for 1 minute.", "Add in celery, onion and green pepper.", "Stir fry for 2 min till veggies are crispy.", "Add in ham, garlic pwdr and pepper.", "Stir fry 3 to 4 minuets.", "Add in rice and stir fry 2 to 3 min.", "Stir in bacon, egg and soy sauce, heat through and serve."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1/3 lb bulk sausage", "3 lb yellow crook neck squash", "1 tsp salt", "1 tsp granulated garlic powder", "1/4 cup dehydrated onions", "1 tbsp margarine", "1 nonstick spray"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat a pan.", "Spray with nonstick spray.", "Add the squash let cook 7 minutes.", "there should be a lot of liquid in pan, if so, drain it.", "Add sausage, salt and garlic.", "Cover let cook 5 minutes stirring occasionally.", "Add onions.", "Mix well cook till onions are tender.", "Add margarine.", "If the squash caramelizes, this is awesome.", "That's what you want to happen.", "After all liquid is gone mix well and let sit 3 minutes serve.", "Hope you enjoy!"]

recipes.dish_name: Cheesy Butternut Squash Penne With Italian Sausage #Ragu
recipes.ingredients: ["1 cup white onion, chopped", "1 tablespoon olive oil", "6 large garlic cloves, roasted and mashed", "1 12 cups butternut squash, cooked and mashed (frozen or fresh)", "2 (16 ounce) jars Ragu Pasta Sauce (cheesy parmesan pasta sauce with roasted garlic)", "2 teaspoons dried basil", "2 teaspoons white pepper", "8 ounces goat cheese", "12 ounces penne pasta, slightly undercooked", "2 cups shredded Italian cheese, divided", "1 lb Italian sausage", "12 cup grated parmesan cheese", "12 cup garlic and herb breadcrumbs", "3 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted"]
recipes.steps: ["Preheat oven to 350.", "In large skillet over medium heat, saute the onion in the olive oil until transparent (7-10 minutes).", "Add mashed roasted garlic and mix until garlic is incorporated throughout the onions.", "Turn off heat.", "Add butternut squash, Ragu Roasted Garlic Parmesan Sauce, basil, white pepper, goat cheese, pasta and 1 cup Italian cheeses.", "Mix well and transfer to 13 x 9 baking dish.", "Wipe out skillet.", "Remove sausage from its casings and cook in skillet over medium medium high heat until cooked through and crumbly (break up sausage into small pieces as you are cooking).", "Drain and add to butternut/alfredo mixture.", "Stir the entire mixture well.", "Combine Parmesan Cheese, bread crumbs and butter.", "Sprinkle top of casserole with 1 cup Italian Cheese followed by the cheese/bread crumb mixture.", "Bake until light brown on top and bubbly (30-45 minutes).", "Freezes well before or after cooking."]

recipes.dish_name: Apple and Gorgonzola Stuffed Pork Chops
recipes.ingredients: ["4 whole Thick Cut Pork Chops", "1 Tablespoon Butter", "2 whole Medium Sized Apples", "1 Tablespoon Packed Brown Sugar", "4 Tablespoons Gorgonzola Crumbles", "2 Tablespoons Olive Oil", "2 teaspoons Salt", "2 teaspoons Black Pepper"]
recipes.steps: ["Butterfly (cut a deep slice into) each pork chop.", "Youll need that pocket when it comes time to stuff each chop.", "Then season them with the salt and pepper on both sides.", "Melt butter in a medium size pan over medium heat.", "While the butter is melting, dice the apples into small, bite sized chunks.", "Add apples and brown sugar to the butter and sautee for several minutes.", "Stir frequently, you dont the apples to get mushy!", "When you feel the apples are done, transfer them to a bowl and add the gorgonzola.", "Stuff each pork chop with a nice spoonful of the apple and gorgonzola mixture.", "Add the olive oil to the pan and heat over medium high.", "When the pan is back up to temperature, add the pork chops and cook thoroughly, roughly 4 minutes per side.", "I like to serve these with mashed potatoes and green beans."]

recipes.dish_name: Nagaimo Yam Filled Sweet and Salty Teriyaki Pork Rolls
recipes.ingredients: ["3 slice Thinly sliced pork", "8 cm Nagaimo yam", "1 dash Salt and pepper", "1 Plain flour", "1 1/2 tbsp Vegetable oil", "1 1/2 tbsp Soy sauce", "1 tbsp Mirin", "1/2 tbsp Sugar", "1 Shichimi spice"]
recipes.steps: ["Cut the nagaimo yams into sticks.", "Cut the pork in half length-wise, lightly season just one side with salt and pepper, flip over, wrap the nagaimo yams diagonally, and lightly coat in flour.", "Place the rolls with the overlap facing down into a preheated frying pan coated with vegetable oil, cook until brown, and then brown all over and cook through while shaking the pan back and forth.", "Wipe excess grease, add the mixed seasoning ingredients, and coat the rolls by shaking the pan back and forth, then it is done Sprinkle on shichimi spice to taste.", "A version with king oyster mushrooms - ..", "With enoki mushrooms ..", "With shiso and mentaiko spicy pollack roe -."]

recipes.ingredients: ["3 tbsp. butter", "3 tbsp. flour", "2 c. water", "1/3 teaspoon salt", "1/2 teaspoon celery salt", "1/4 teaspoon paprika", "1/8 teaspoon pepper", "6 sausages (breakfast or possibly other)", "1 c. minced carrots", "1 c. minced celery", "1/3 c. minced onion", "12 ounce. canned corn with red and green peppers", "10 ounce. sharp Cheddar, shredded", "1 can evaporated lowfat milk", "Snipped parsley"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat butter, carrots, celery and onion in large saucepan till bubbly.", "Reduce heat and cover.", "Simmer, stirring occasionally, 20 min.", "Meanwhile, fry sausages.", "Drain.", "Slice into bite size pcs.", "Stir flour into vegetable mix.", "Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, till mix is bubbly.", "Stir in water, salt, celery salt, paprika, pepper and corn.", "Heat to boiling."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 loaf white bread, (set out to dry overnight)", "Turkey neck and giblets (boiled till done)", "1 pound pork sausage", "2 c. minced celery", "1 lg. onion, minced", "1 egg", "Broth, reserved from cooked giblets"]
recipes.steps: ["Brown sausage in large pan, drain.", "Remove cooked sausage and set aside.", "In same pan, saute/fry onion and celery.", "Cube the dry white bread and add in to celery and onion.", "Also add in sausage.", "Add in 1 egg and sufficient broth to moisten mix.", "Season with salt and pepper and poultry seasoning to taste.", "Place stuffing in a large baking pan, bake at 350 degrees for approximately 30 min or possibly till hard and done."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 12 lbs Italian sausage", "1 tablespoon olive oil", "2 carrots, sliced", "1 onion, chopped", "15 ounces cannellini beans, rinsed and drained", "34 cup white wine", "1 sprig tarragon, torn (or thyme)"]
recipes.steps: ["Cook sausage in olive oil in skillet over medium high heat, 10 to 15 minutes; remove and slice.", "Add carrots and onion to skillet and cook over medium high heat until tender, about 10 minutes.", "Add beans and white white, simmer for 5 minutes.", "Fold in sausage and tarragon or thyme, whichever you're using."]

recipes.dish_name: Special Side Dish with Marinated New Onion, Green Pepper, and Ham
recipes.ingredients: ["1 Onion", "1 Green pepper", "4 slice Ham", "2 tbsp Vegetable oil", "2 tbsp Rice vinegar", "1/4 to 1 teaspoon Sugar", "1 1/2 tsp Salt", "1 pinch Black pepper"]
recipes.steps: ["Finely julienne the onion and green pepper.", "If you don't like the smell or spiciness of onions, briefly soak in water.", "Otherwise, combine and rinse well in running water as shown in the picture.", "Cut the ham into strips about the same length as the vegetables in Step 1.", "After rinsing the ingredients from Step 1, drain the water from them thoroughly.", "Add the seasoning ingredients to a clean bowl, and whisk together until they thicken a bit.", "Add the ingredients from steps 1 and 2 and coat with the sauce.", "Place in the refrigerator for 30 minutes.", "During the 30 minutes, toss the ingredients again 2 times to ensure the flavours are distributed evenly.", "Instead of ham, try using salmon, dry-cured ham, or drained tuna.", "Be sure to adjust the salt accordingly.", "As a finishing touch, drizzle on mayonnaise or soy sauce.", "The dish is very pretty if you use colorful peppers instead of green.", "This dish is also delicious if you use non-oil green shiso dressing.", "I do this when I am on a diet."]

recipes.dish_name: Linguine With Balsamic Tomatoes, Bacon, and Manchego Cheese
recipes.ingredients: ["8 ounces whole wheat linguine", "1 pint cherry tomatoes (grape works too)", "3 tablespoons balsamic vinegar", "2 tablespoons olive oil", "6 slices bacon", "1 small yellow onion, sliced", "4 ounces manchego cheese", "salt and pepper"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat oven to 400.", "On a baking sheet toss the tomatoes with the balsamic, olive oil, and a pinch of salt and pepper.", "Roast at 400 for 30 minutes, stirring every 7-10 minutes.", "Let cool slightly, then pulse all of the ingredients (you may have to scrape some of the bits off the sheet pan do it, its worth it) in a food processor until its the consistency you want.", "Meanwhile crisp up the bacon slices in a skillet over medium heat.", "Reserve 1 Tbsp of the drippings, turn the heat down to medium-low, and saute the onions until they are caramelized and tender.", "Cook the pasta until its al dente according to package directions.", "Now its time to assemble: in a large bowl toss the pasta with the tomato sauce.", "Add the onions, crumbled bacon, and chunks of the Manchego cheese.", "Toss it all together and serve hot (or cold) as a main course or a side."]

recipes.dish_name: Slow Cooker Shredded Pork That Cooks While You are at Work
recipes.ingredients: ["15 ounces tomato sauce (can)", "3 tablespoons chili powder (optional)", "3 tablespoons light brown sugar", "2 teaspoons ground coriander", "1 teaspoon ground cumin", "3 lbs pork shoulder, trimmed of excess fat", "5 garlic cloves, chopped", "2 yellow onions, diced", "14 cup lime juice (optional)", "salt", "pepper"]
recipes.steps: ["Combine tomato sauce, chili powder, brown sugar, coriander, and cumin in the base of the slow cooker.", "Stir to combine and distribute spices evenly.", "Sprinkle the pork with salt and pepper and place in slow cooker.", "Using tongs, turn the pork to coat it evenly in the sauce.", "Add the garlic and onions, stir again.", "Place lid on slow cooker and cook until pork is tender and beginning to fall apart, 8 - 10 hours on low or 4 - 6 hours on high.", "Transfer pork to a serving bowl and shred with two forks, removing excess fat.", "Skim excess fat off of the remaining sauce in the slow cooker.", "Stir in lime juice and season with salt and pepper.", "Add the shredded pork back to the slow cooker and mix it with the sauce.", "Enjoy!"]

recipes.dish_name: Roasted Cornish Game Hens with Bacon-Herb Butter
recipes.ingredients: ["1/2 cups Unsalted Butter, Softened", "2 strips Thick-sliced Smoked Bacon, Roughly Chopped", "1 Tablespoon Chopped Fresh Sage", "1/2 Tablespoons Chopped Fresh Oregano", "1 teaspoon Fresh Thyme Leaves", "Kosher Salt And Black Pepper", "2 whole Cornish Game Hens, Cleaned And Dried", "1 whole Small Yellow Onion, Quartered", "Extra Virgin Olive Oil"]
recipes.steps: ["Preheat oven to 425 degrees F.", "In a food processor, pulse together the butter, bacon, and herbs until combined.", "Season the mixture with 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt and 1/2 teaspoon of black pepper.", "Take each hen and slide your fingers between the skin and breast meat to loosen.", "Be careful not to tear the skin.", "Gently rub 2-3 tablespoons of the butter mixture underneath the skin.", "Inside the cavity, heavily salt and pepper the hen.", "Stuff the cavity with the remaining butter mixture and quartered onion.", "Rub the exterior of the hens with olive oil and generously season with kosher salt and black pepper.", "Truss the hens with kitchen twine.", "Place the hens on a large, rimmed baking sheet or shallow roasting pan.", "Rotating the pan halfway through cooking, roast the hens until a thermometer inserted into thickest part of the thigh registers 170 degrees F, about 45-50 minutes.", "Carefully remove the hens and rest on a cutting board.", "Loosely tent with aluminum foil and allow hens to rest for 10-15 minutes before serving."]

recipes.ingredients: ["3 loaves frozen bread dough, thawed", "1 lb mild sausage", "1 lb hot sausage", "8 ounces mozzarella cheese, shredded", "8 ounces sharp cheddar cheese, shredded", "parmesan cheese"]
recipes.steps: ["Cook sausage and drain well; shred cheeses.", "Roll out bread, one loaf at a time.", "Spread each with about 1/3 of sausage and 1/3 of cheese, and then sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.", "Roll up the dough and close the ends.", "Brush the top with melted butter.", "Wrap in foil and bake about 45 minutes at 350 degrees or until brown.", "You can freeze these and cook later.", "My notes: I also cooked some chopped onion and garlic with the sausage.", "I've never frozen them, so I don't know how long you'd cook them if they were frozen, or if you'd thaw them first."]

recipes.ingredients: ["3 12 cups tri-colored fusilli (spiral pasta)", "2 cups broccoli florets", "1 tablespoon canola oil", "1 large onion, finely chopped", "23 cup cubed cooked honey-roasted ham", "1 (284 ml) cancampbell's condensed low-fat cream of celery soup", "1 13 cups reduced-fat old shredded cheese, shredded", "12 cup 1% low-fat milk", "14 teaspoon fresh ground pepper"]
recipes.steps: ["Cook fuslli according to package directions, omitting salt.", "Add broccoli for last 5 minutes of cook-time.", "Drain and set aside, keeping warm.", "Heat oil in 4 quart saucepan at medium-high.", "Add onion and cook until tender, stirring occasionally.", "Add ham and cook 2 more minutes.", "Stir in soup and heat to a boil.", "Reduce heat to low.", "Add cheese and milk, stirring until cheese is melted.", "Stir in fusili, broccoli and pepper and heat through until hot and bubbling."]

recipes.ingredients: ["16 ounces mueller's lasagna noodles", "1 (15 ounce) container ricotta cheese", "12 cup grated parmesan cheese", "2 eggs", "4 cups shredded mozzarella cheese", "2 (28 ounce) jars pasta sauce, any flavor", "1 lb bulk Italian sausage, cooked, drained, crumbled"]
recipes.steps: ["1.", "Preheat oven to 350F.", "2.", "Cook pasta according to package directions.", "3.", "Combine ricotta cheese, Parmesan cheese, eggs and 1 cup mozzarella cheese in a medium bowl; mix well.", "4.", "Spread 1 cup pasta sauce in a 13x9-inch baking dish.", "Layer with half each of the lasagna, ricotta cheese mixture, sausage, remaining pasta sauce and mozzarella cheese.", "Repeat layering.", "Bake uncovered 40 minutes, or until hot and bubbly.", "Let stand 15 minutes before serving.", "I use Homemade Summer Sausage AKA Salami Recipe #37881 by morelhunter."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 lb cooked turkey sausage, cut into 1/4-inch slices (I use Jennie-O brand)", "1 bunch broccoli, cut into florets", "12 cup sliced red onion", "15 12 ounces diced tomatoes, undrained", "1 tablespoon minced fresh basil or 1 teaspoon dried basil", "1 tablespoon minced fresh parsley or 1 teaspoon dried parsley", "1 teaspoon sugar", "3 cups cooked spiral shaped pasta"]
recipes.steps: ["While pasta cooks, saute sausage, broccoli and onion in large skillet, 5-6 minutes or until broccoli is crisp-tender.", "Add tomatoes, basil, parsley and sugar.", "Simmer, covered 10 minutes.", "Add pasta and heat through."]

recipes.ingredients: ["300 grams Pork (breast, roast, belly, thin-cuts, etc. Anything is okay! You can use chicken, too.)", "1 tbsp *Soy sauce", "1 tbsp *Sake", "1 tsp *Sesame oil", "1 Katakuriko", "1/2 Carrot", "1/2 Onion", "2 Green peppers", "3 tbsp Vinegar", "3 tbsp Soy sauce", "3 tbsp Sugar", "2 tbsp Ketchup", "2 tbsp Sake", "1 tbsp Mirin", "4 tbsp Water", "1 tbsp Katakuriko"]
recipes.steps: ["Cut the meat into bite-sized pieces.", "Season in the * ingredients and let sit for about 10 minutes.", "Roughly chop the carrots, cut the onions into wedges, and cut the green peppers into bite-sized pieces.", "Put into a heatproof bowl and microwave for about 3 minutes.", "Combine the sauce ingredients into a bowl and mix well.", "Put the seasoned meat into a plastic bag with the katakuriko and shake to coat.", "Cook in a fryer at 170C or in a frying pan full of oil.", "Put the sweet and sour sauce and all the meat and vegetables into a cool frying pan.", "Turn on the heat and cook on medium heat while lightly mixing until the sauce has thickened.", "It will take about 2-3 minutes for the sauce to thicken."]

recipes.dish_name: Baked Pork Ribs With Hoisin Barbecue Sauce Recipe
recipes.ingredients: ["4 lb baby back pork ribs", "1 tsp Chinese five-spice pwdr", "1 tsp onion pwdr", "1 c. hoisin sauce", "1/2 c. bottled chili sauce", "1/4 c. Sherry", "4 tsp chili-garlic sauce", "1 Tbsp. chopped peeled fresh ginger", "1 Tbsp. oriental sesame oil"]
recipes.steps: ["Place ribs in large roasting pan.", "Pierce meat with fork.", "Sprinkle with Chinese five-spice pwdr and onion pwdr; rub mix into meat.", "Whisk remaining ingredients in small bowl to blend.", "Pour sauce over ribs, turning to coat.", "Turn ribs meat-side down; cover pan with aluminum foil and chill overnight.", "Preheat oven to 400 degrees.", "Bake ribs, covered, till just tender, about 30 min.", "Uncover and turn ribs meat-side up; bake till ribs are cooked through, basting occasionally, about 35 min.", "Cut meat between bones to separate ribs and serve.", "This recipe yields 6 servings.", "Comments: If you prefer to grill the ribs - that will intensify the hoisin flavor - remove them from the marinade (don't bake) and grill them over medium heat till tender and lightly charred, turning often and basting occasionally with marinade, about 25 min.", "Look for chili-garlic sauce in the Asian foods section of supermarkets."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1/2 lb. Italian turkey sausage", "1 small each green and red pepper, cut into strips Target 1 pkg For $2.99 thru 02/06", "1/2 cup slivered onions King Sooper's 1 lb For $0.99 thru 02/09", "2/3 cup PHILADELPHIA Italian Herb Cooking Creme", "1 thin ready-to-use baked pizza crust (12 inch)", "1 cup KRAFT Shredded Mozzarella Cheese with a TOUCH OF PHILADELPHIA"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat oven to 425 degrees F.", "Crumble sausage into medium nonstick skillet.", "Add peppers and onions; cook on medium-high heat 6 to 7 min.", "or until sausage is done.", "Spread cooking creme onto crust; top with sausage mixture and cheese.", "Bake 10 to 12 min.", "or until cheese is melted and crust is golden brown."]

recipes.ingredients: ["One 6-ounce box Uncle Bens long-grain and wild rice", "1 pound ground sausage", "2 small onions, chopped", "One 4-ounce can mushroom pieces", "One 10 3/4-ounce can condensed cream of mushroom soup", "4 tablepoons (1/2 stick) butter"]
recipes.steps: ["Preheat oven to 350 degrees.", "Cook rice according to directions on box.", "In a heavy skillet over medium heat, cook sausage until thoroughly done, about 4 to 5 minutes; drain.", "Combine all ingredients except butter and pour into casserole dish.", "Dot top with butter.", "Bake until bubbly, about 25 minutes."]

recipes.dish_name: Pasilla Pepper-Grilled Pork Loin with Potatoes
recipes.ingredients: ["1/2 cup KRAFT Zesty Italian Dressing", "6 dried pasilla chiles, stemmed, seeded", "1 boneless pork loin roast (2-1/2 lb.), trimmed", "1 small onion, sliced King Sooper's 1 lb For $0.99 thru 02/09", "1-1/2 lb. red new potatoes, quartered King Sooper's 5 lb For $1.88 thru 02/09"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat grill to medium heat.", "Blend dressing and chiles in blender until smooth.", "Place meat on center of large sheet of heavy-duty foil; top with chile mixture and vegetables.", "Fold foil to make packet.", "Place on grill grate.", "Grill 40 to 45 min.", "or until meat is done (145 degrees F).", "Remove from grill.", "Let stand 3 min.", "Cut slits in foil to release steam before opening packet.", "Slice meat.", "Serve with vegetables."]

recipes.ingredients: ["4 slices OSCAR MAYER Bacon, cut into 1/2-inch pieces Rite Aid 2 For $7.00 thru 02/06", "3 large Spanish onions, thinly sliced, separated into rings", "2 cans (14-1/2 oz. each) fat-free reduced-sodium beef broth", "1/2 tsp. black pepper", "1/4 tsp. dried thyme leaves", "5 slices Italian bread, toasted", "1 cup KRAFT Shredded Italian* Five Cheese with a TOUCH OF PHILADELPHIA", "2 Tbsp. KRAFT Grated Parmesan Cheese"]
recipes.steps: ["Cook and stir bacon in large saucepan on medium heat until crisp.", "Remove bacon from pan with slotted spoon; drain on paper towels.", "Discard all but 2 Tbsp.", "drippings from pan.", "Add onions to reserved drippings in pan; cook 20 min.", "or until golden brown, stirring frequently.", "Add broth, pepper and thyme; stir.", "Simmer 15 min.", "Remove from heat; stir in bacon.", "Heat broiler.", "Ladle soup into 5 ovenproof bowls; top with remaining ingredients.", "Broil, 4 inches from heat, 2 to 3 min.", "or until cheeses are melted and golden brown."]

recipes.ingredients: ["4 lbs pork shoulder, trimmer of fat", "6 garlic cloves, minced", "2 teaspoons cumin", "2 teaspoons oregano", "12 cup lime juice", "12 cup orange juice", "12 slices low-fat swiss cheese, halved (1/2 pound)", "24 slicer rolls", "34 lb low sodium ham, deli sliced", "48 dill pickles", "12 teaspoons mustard"]
recipes.steps: ["Put pork in lightly oiled crock pot.", "Sprinkle with half of the garlic, cumin, and oregano.", "Mix remainder of the spices (cumin - oregano) and mix with the juices and pour over all in the pot.", "Cover and cook on low for 4-5 hours or until pork is cooked through.", "Transfer to a cutting board and break into pieces or shred with a fork.", "Skim fat and reserve juices.", "Dived cheese among tops of rolls and broil until melted.", "Layer bottoms of rolls with ham and pork and drizzle with juices and then layer with pickles,mustard and tops of rolls."]

recipes.ingredients: ["250 grams Strong bread flour", "50 grams Cake flour", "4 grams Dry yeast", "150 grams Water", "1 Egg", "30 grams Sugar", "10 grams Skim milk powder", "5 grams Salt", "30 grams Butter", "2 Fish sausage", "1 1/2 tsp Curry powder", "1 tbsp Milk", "40 grams Dried panko"]
recipes.steps: ["Place all of the ingredients except for the butter, into the bread maker and start the bread dough course.", "After 8 minutes, add the butter and then leave the rest of the work to the machine.", "Place the dough on a lightly floured surface and separate into 8 round portions.", "Let sit for 15 minutes.", "Cut the fish sausages in half both vertically and horizontally so that 1 sausage becomes 4 pieces.", "Cover completely in curry powder.", "Use a rolling pin to roll out the dough into ovals, place the fish sausage on each portion of dough, fold in half around the sausage, and seal the edges.", "Brush the surfaces with milk and coat with panko.", "Let rise a second time for 20-30 minutes and then deep-fry in 170C oil until the surfaces are a nice golden brown.", "Then they are finished."]

recipes.dish_name: Easy Pork Chop Dinner for Two Recipe
recipes.ingredients: ["6 bone-in pork shoulder chops, each 1/4- to 1/2-inch thick", "3 tablespoons soy sauce", "3 tablespoons Chinese rice wine or dry sherry", "2 tablespoons granulated sugar", "1 12 teaspoons kosher salt", "1/2 teaspoon Chinese five-spice powder", "1 tablespoon minced garlic", "1 large egg", "6 tablespoons cornstarch", "Canola oil, for pan-frying"]
recipes.steps: ["Arrange the pork chops in a single layer in a shallow pan (its fine if they overlap).", "Whisk together the soy sauce, rice wine, sugar, salt, five-spice powder, garlic, and egg until combined.", "Pour over the pork, cover, and let marinate in the fridge for at least 30 minutes and as long as 4 hours.", "Remove the pork chops from the marinade and onto a plate.", "Pour the marinade into a mixing bowl and whisk in the cornstarch until combine and there are no large lumps.", "Put the pork chops back in the pan they were marinating in, and the cornstarch mixture, and turn them around until theyre evenly coated.", "Set a grill pan over medium-high heat and add enough oil to come about 1/4 inch from the bottom.", "when the oil starts to shimmer, add half the pork chops.", "Cook, flipping once, until cooked through, about 2 to 3 minutes per side.", "Repeat with the remaining pork chops.", "Serve."]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 acorn squash, halved and seeded", "1/4 c. minced celery", "2 tbsp. minced onion", "2 tbsp. minced green pepper", "4 tbsp. butter", "1 c. finely minced cooked ham", "1/2 teaspoon salt", "1 1/2 c. soft bread crumbs", "2 tbsp. melted butter"]
recipes.steps: ["Place squash, cut side down, in shallow baking pan.", "Bake at 350 degrees for 45 to 50 min, or possibly till done.", "Cook celery, onion, and green pepper in the 4 Tbsp.", "butter just till tender.", "Scoop out pulp of squash; mash.", "Mix in cooked vegetables, ham, salt and 3/4 c. of crumbs.", "Return mix to shells.", "Combine remaining crumbs and 2 Tbsp.", "butter; sprinkle over squash.", "Bake 10 min more."]

recipes.ingredients: ["8 lb Precooked ham, with fat left On", "1 1/2 c. Burbon", "2 Tbsp. Butter", "1 c. Maple syrup", "1/2 c. Brown sugar", "1/2 c. Grnd or possibly finely minced Pecans", "1/2 c. Pecan halves"]
recipes.steps: ["Score the skin & fat of the ham & rub liberally with burbon.", "Place in smallest baking dish which will hold it & pour over the rest of the burbon.", "Marinate for 2-3 hrs, basting every half hour.", "Pour off excess whisky & bake the ham, skin side up, for 2 hrs at 325.", "In a saucepan heat the butter stir in burbon marinade, syrup, sugar & pecans.", "Bring mix to a boil.", "Pour the glaze over it & brush well with a pastry brush.", "Decorate with pecan halves & bake for an additional 15 min."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 pkg. (8 oz.) PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese, softened", "1/4 tsp. garlic powder", "1/4 cup beer", "6 slices cooked OSCAR MAYER Butcher Thick Cut Hickory Smoked Bacon, chopped", "1 cup KRAFT Shredded Sharp Cheddar Cheese", "2 fresh jalapeno peppers, halved, seeded and thinly sliced"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat oven to 350 degrees F.", "Beat cream cheese and garlic powder in medium bowl with mixer until blended.", "Gradually beat in beer.", "Stir in remaining ingredients.", "Spread onto bottom of 1-1/2 qt.", "casserole or 9-inch pie plate.", "Bake 15 to 20 min.", "or until heated through."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 pound warm bulk pork sausage", "1 (10 3/4 ounce.) can tomato soup", "3 cloves garlic, crushed", "1 1/2 teaspoon dry whole oregano", "1 1/2 teaspoon dry whole basil", "1 (8 ounce.) pkg. lasagna noodles", "2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese", "1 (16 ounce.) carton cottage cheese", "3/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese"]
recipes.steps: ["Brown sausage in a skillet, stirring to crumble, drain off drippings.", "Stir in soup, garlic, oregano, and basil.", "Mix well.", "Cook noodles according to package directions; drain.", "Place 3 noodles in a lightly greased 13 x 9 x 3 inch baking dish.", "Layer 1/3 each of meat mix, Mozzarella cheese, cottage cheese, and Parmesan cheese over noodles.", "Repeat layer twice.", "Cover with aluminum foil.", "Let stand 2 hrs or possibly chill overnight.", "Bake covered at 350 degrees for 30 min.", "Yields 6 servings."]

recipes.dish_name: Cuban Style Pork with Papaya Mango Salsa
recipes.ingredients: ["1/2 firm ripe papaya", "1 medium firm ripe mango", "1/2 medium red onion, chopped fine", "3 tablespoons fresh lime juice", "1/2 small jalapeno chili, seeded and minced", "1 tablespoon chopped fresh coriander"]
recipes.steps: ["Seed and peel papaya.", "Peel mango and cut flesh from pit.", "Cut papaya and mango into 1/4-inch dice and in a small bowl toss with onion and lime juice.", "Stir diced jalapeno into salsa with coriander and salt and pepper to taste.", "Chill salsa, covered, at least 2 hours and up to 24.", "Yield: 2 1/2 cups"]

recipes.dish_name: Corn, Bacon and Tomato Bento Space Filler (Freeze to Store!)
recipes.ingredients: ["150 grams Corn kernels", "3 to 4 slices Bacon", "6 to 7 Cherry tomatoes", "1 dash Parsley (dried)", "1 dash Mayonnaise", "1 dash Parmesan cheese", "1 for stir-frying Butter or margarine", "1 Salt and pepper"]
recipes.steps: ["Cut the bacon into 5 mm wide pieces.", "Cut the cherry tomatoes in half.", "Drain the canned corn kernels.", "Put the butter in a frying pan and stir fry the corn, bacon and parsley.", "Season with salt and pepper.", "Transfer to a plate to cool.", "Put into small bento cups, and add a dab of mayonnaise on top of each one.", "Put a tomato half on top of the mayonnaise, and sprinkle on some cheese.", "Make a freezer tray with an empty milk carton and put it in a freezer bag.", "Put the assembled cups on the milk carton, close up the bag and freeze.", "Done.", "When you need one, just take it out and microwave it."]

recipes.ingredients: ["10 -12 slices day-old Italian bread or 10 -12 slices French bread", "1 tablespoon butter or 1 tablespoon margarine", "1 medium red bell pepper, diced (about 3/4 cup)", "1 medium onion, chopped (about 1/2 cup)", "34 lb cooked Canadian bacon or 34 lb ham, cubed", "6 eggs", "3 12 cups milk", "1 sprig fresh thyme"]
recipes.steps: ["Grease a 2-quart covered casserole.", "Stack 3 bread slices; cut into long strips and then into cubes.", "Continue with remaining bread to make 6 cups of bread cubes.", "In a medium skillet, melt butter over medium heat.", "Add pepper and onion; saute until softened but not browned, about 5 minutes.", "Transfer pepper and onion to the prepared dish.", "Add bread and Canadian bacon; stir to combine.", "In a medium bowl, combine eggs and milk; using a fork, stir mixture until well blended.", "Pour egg mixture over bread mixture.", "Cover casserole; let stand 1 hour at room temperature or chill overnight.", "Preheat oven to 325F.", "Bake casserole covered, for 30 minutes.", "Uncover and bake 30 minutes longer.", "Garnish with thyme and serve immediately."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 ounce pork belly, cut in two", "kosher salt, to taste", "1/4 cup sugar", "1 tablespoon Korean chile flake", "1/4 cup fish sauce", "1 tablespoon water", "1/4 cup white vinegar", "2 tablespoons negi (scallion) whites", "2 tablespoons garlic", "1 cup chile sauce base", "1 cup plus 2 tablespoons cucumber, sliced on a mandoline about 1/8-inch thick", "1/4 cup plus 3 tablespoons carrots, sliced on a mandoline about 1/8-inch thick", "vegetable oil, enough to cover 2 inches of frying pan", "3/4 cup plus 1 tablespoon sushi rice", "1 tablespoon negi, chopped", "1 pinch bonito flake", "1/2 tablespoon furikake (Japanese seasoning mix commonly found at Asian markets)", "a few sprigs cilantro", "1/4 cup tamari"]
recipes.steps: ["Combine the salt, sugar and chile flakes and mix well.", "Combine fish sauce, water and vinegar and mix well.", "Pour the vinegar mixture into the sugar mixture, and mix well.", "Slice the negi whites into thin rounds, cutting across the stalk.", "Peel and slice the garlic thinly, across the grain.", "Add the garlic and negi to mixture, and mix well.", "Refrigerate for later use."]

recipes.ingredients: ["4 thickly cut (1 inch at least) pork chops", "2 teaspoon coarse grnd pepper", "2 teaspoon molasses", "2 teaspoon garlic", "2 teaspoon salt"]
recipes.steps: ["Combine molasses, grnd pepper, garlic and salt.", "Rub mix proportionately on each side of the pork chops.", "Allow to marinate for at least 1 hour.", "Grill on a warm grill about 5 min per side or possibly till done.", "Bon Appetit!"]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 pt Half And Half", "3 Tbsp. Butter", "2 Tbsp. Flour", "2 clv garlic -- chopped", "1/3 c. Parmesan Cheese -- grated", "1/4 c. Parsley coarsely minced", "1/2 lb Bacon cooked,liquid removed,chopp"]
recipes.steps: ["In a medium saucepan, heat butter over medium-low heat.", "Add in garlic and stir-fry for 2 to 3 min.", "Stir in flour till well-blended.", "Add in half & half.", "Stir sauce over medium-low heat.", "Don't allow sauce to boil or possibly stick to bottom of pan.", "Reduce heat if necessary.", "Allow sauce to thicken (about 20 min), stirring frequently.", "When sauce is near desired consistency, add in parmesan cheese.", "Stir to heat cheese for 2 min.", "Remove sauce from heat.", "Toss in bacon and parsley.", "Serve over cooked pasta."]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. milk", "1 slice white bread, torn into small pieces", "1 lb. (450 g) extra-lean ground beef", "6 slices bacon, finely chopped", "1/2 cup finely chopped onions", "1 egg, beaten", "6 Cracker Barrel Medium Light Cheddar Cheese Slices", "6 hamburger buns, split", "6 Tbsp. Miracle Whip Original Spread", "6 lettuce leaves", "1 large tomato, cut into 6 slices"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat greased barbecue to medium heat.", "Add milk to bread in large bowl; stir to evenly moisten bread.", "Let stand 1 min.", "Add next 4 ingredients; mix just until blended.", "Shape into 6 (1/2-inch-thick) patties.", "Grill 4 to 5 min.", "on each side or until done (160 degrees F); top with cheese.", "Add buns, cut sides down, to barbecue; grill 1 min.", "or until buns are lightly toasted.", "Spread buns with Miracle Whip; fill with lettuce, tomatoes and cheeseburgers."]

recipes.dish_name: Avocado toast with poached eggs & bacon
recipes.ingredients: ["1/2 ripe avocado", "2 slices of multi grain bread", "4 slice bacon", "3 slice tomato", "2 eggs", "1/2 tsp vinegar", "pinch salt & pepper"]
recipes.steps: ["Bring water and vinegar to a boil in a small pot.", "Heat pan and cook bacon slices.", "Slice avocados and tomatoes.", "Set aside", "Toast bread slices.", "Gently put eggs into boiling water.", "Turn off heat immediately.", "Assemble ingredients together by placing avocado slices on toast first followed by tomato slices, 2 strips of bacon on each slice of bread, lettuce leaves, and poached eggs.", "Finish with a pinch of salt and pepper.", "ENJOY!"]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 12 cups ground pork", "4 garlic cloves, crushed", "2 stalks lemongrass, sliced", "1 bunch cilantro, chopped", "2 red chilies, seeded and diced", "1 tablespoon brown sugar", "1 tablespoon fish sauce", "1 egg, beaten", "2 garlic cloves, crushed", "1 red chili pepper, seeded and chopped", "1 tablespoon sugar", "12 lime, seeded and chopped (peel included)", "1 12 tablespoons fish sauce", "12 cup peanuts, chopped", "1 bunch rice sticks", "16 -20 lettuce leaves", "2 carrots, grated", "1 bunch fresh basil, leaves only", "1 bunch of fresh mint, leaves only"]
recipes.steps: ["Soak 12-16 wooden skewers or chopsticks in water for 30 minutes before using.", "In a food processor combine the first 8 ingredients (pork - egg), processing until a paste is formed.", "Chill for at least 30 minutes.", "Take 1-2 tablespoons of mixture and using wet hands form into a ball; repeat until all the mixture is used.", "Press soaked skewer through the middle of each ball and thread 2-3 balls onto each stick.", "Pat until snug and chill.", "To make the Nuoc Cham, in a spice mill or motor and pestle combine the next 3 ingredients (garlic - sugar).", "Add the chopped lime and any lime juice that has been collected, puree again and then stir in fish sauce and 1/2 cup water.", "Set aside.", "Toast the peanuts in a dry skillet and then crush coarsely and set aside.", "Soak noodles in hot water for 15 minutes and then boil for 1 minute.", "Drain and set aside.", "Light a grill or preheat broiler and grill balls until cooked through.", "Serve pork balls, sprinkled with the nuts and with a salad made of lettuce, mint and basil.", "To eat, remove from sticks, wrap in lettuce, add carrots, noodles, peanuts and herbs, roll up and dip in the Nuco Cham."]

recipes.dish_name: Ww 6 Points Loaded Bacon Cheddar Fries
recipes.ingredients: ["1 medium baking potato", "cooking spray", "14 cup low-fat cheddar cheese or 14 cup colby cheese", "2 tablespoons bacon bits", "2 -3 tablespoons fat free sour cream"]
recipes.steps: ["Preheat oven to 425 degrees.", "Scrub potato and rinse.", "Cut potato into 1/2\" strips, leaving skin on.", "Spray baking sheet with cooking spray.", "Place potato strips on baking sheet, skin side down.", "Bake for 20 minutes, then turn potatoes and bake additonal 15 minutes.", "Top fries with cheese and sprinkle with bacon bits.", "Return baking sheet to oven for a minute to melt the cheese.", "Add optional dollop of sour cream to top or on the side."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 cup rice", "1 (1 1/4 ounce) envelope onion soup mix", "14 cup ketchup", "2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce", "2 tablespoons bell peppers, chopped", "2 cups boiling water", "4 pork chops"]
recipes.steps: ["Mix all ingredients except chops and put in casserole dish.", "Top with pork chops.", "Bake covered at 350 degrees for one hour."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 14 cups all-purpose flour", "14 cup parmesan cheese", "2 teaspoons baking powder", "1 teaspoon italian seasoning", "18 teaspoon salt", "14 cup butter, cut into pieces", "23 cup milk or 23 cup half-and-half cream", "2 tablespoons bacon bits", "1 tablespoon milk or 1 tablespoon half-and-half cream", "1 tablespoon parmesan cheese"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat oven to 425.", "Combine flour, 1/4 cup cheese, baking powder, italian seasoning and salt in large bowl; cur in butterwith pastry blender until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.", "Stir in 2/3 cup milk and bacon bits; mix just until flour is moistened.", "Turn dough onto lightly floured surface; knead 5 to 8 times or until smooth.", "Roll out dough to 10X6 inch rectangle.", "Cut into 10 (1 inch) strips.", "Place strips 2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheet.", "Brush tops with 1 tablespoon milk; sprinkle with 1 tablespoon cheese.", "Bake 10 to 12 minutes or until lightly browned."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 pound Lean Pork Chops", "1 teaspoon Crushed Garlic", "1 cup Orange Juice", "1/4 cups Soy Sauce", "2 Tablespoons Brown Sugar, Packed", "2 teaspoons Cornstarch", "4 teaspoons Water", "1 dash Red Pepper Flakes", "1 cup Steamed Broccoli", "1 cup Steamed Sugar Snap Peas", "1 cup Water Chestnuts"]
recipes.steps: ["Cube pork chops.", "Spray skillet with Pam and saute the garlic.", "Then add pork and brown cubes until cooked through.", "Remove pork from pan.", "Mix up the orange juice, soy sauce, and brown sugar and add it to your skillet.", "Bring to a boil and reduce for 2 minutes.", "Mix cornstarch and water in small bowl and then whisk it into the orange juice mixture.", "Add red pepper flakes and stir the mixture until it is thickened.", "Return pork and your chopped veggies to pan and simmer for 2 additional minutes to coat meat and vegetables.", "* Use whatever stir-fry type veggies you like.", "They do need to be pre-steamed and chopped ahead of time so that you can just throw them into the sauce at the end of the process."]

recipes.ingredients: ["12 ounces pork tenderloin, cut in 1/2 inch thick slices", "2 egg whites", "1 tablespoon water", "14 cup plain breadcrumbs (Progresso)", "14 cup fresh grated parmesan cheese", "3 tablespoons flour", "1 tablespoon salt", "2 tablespoons olive oil"]
recipes.steps: ["Put pork slices between waxed paper or plastic wrap.", "With a mallet, pound to about 1/2\" thick.", "In a bowl, mix egg whites with water.", "In another bowl, mix parmesan cheese and breadcrumbs.", "Put flour in a third bowl.", "Season pork lightly with salt.", "Dip pork rounds in flour, then in egg mixture, then in cheese/breadcrumb mixture.", "Heat oil in non-stick skillet.", "Cook slices until golden brown and done-- about 2 minutes per side."]

recipes.dish_name: Money Saving & Low Calorie! Steamed Pork and Bean Sprouts
recipes.ingredients: ["2 bags Bean sprouts", "6 slice Thinly sliced pork", "1 dash Salt and pepper", "1 Green onion or scallion", "1 Ponzu"]
recipes.steps: ["Place the bean sprouts in a large frying pan that has a lid.", "Neatly spread out the pork slices and place on top of the bean sprouts.", "Season with a little salt and pepper, cover with the lid, and steam until the pork hsd cooked through.", "Arrange on a dish, pour on some ponzu and top with green onion to finish."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 medium onion chopped", "3 large tomatoes", "3 tbsp tomato paste", "1 oil", "1 garlic", "1/2 tsp red chilli powser", "1 salt", "1/2 tsp blackpepper powde", "1 small green bell pepper sliced", "4 sausages fried and sliced in rounds (any)", "1 grated chedder cheese", "1 grated mozarella cheese", "2 cup all purpose flour", "1 water", "2 tsp yeast", "1/2 tsp baking powder"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat some little oil in a pan and fry onions until soft than add garlic and chopped toamtoes and cook till mushy add tomato paste,salt and pepper and let it cook until it thicken than turn off and let it cool.", "For the dough take yeast and put into half cup of warm water for few mins than add the mixture to the flour,baking powder, salt and add a few teaspoons of oil and knead keep on adding water little by little till you form a sticky dough than cover n let it rise for 2 hrs.", "make big balls when the dough has risen if u want ur pizza thin u can make about three but if u want it thick it can make about two.", "roll with flour when it reaches your desired size top it with the pizza sauce u had made n left to cool put sausage pieces and sliced peppers.", "you can add some tomato and onion slices or even mushrooms or pineapple all this is totally optional.", "sprinkle with the cheeses and slip into the oven and bake till ready."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1/2 teaspoons Garlic Powder", "1/2 teaspoons Onion Powder", "1/2 teaspoons Sea Salt", "1/2 teaspoons Black Pepper", "1/2 teaspoons Dried Thyme", "1/2 teaspoons Dried Oregano", "1/2 teaspoons Dried Parsley", "4 Tablespoons Olive Oil, Divided", "1 pound Pork Tenderloin", "1 Tablespoon Cornstarch + Cold Water"]
recipes.steps: ["Mix all seasoning ingredients and 3 tablespoons olive oil and brush over entire tenderloin.", "Wrap with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 4 hours or more.", "Heat the remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil in a skillet and sear all sides of the tenderloin.", "Preheat oven to 350 degrees.", "Add tenderloin to a 9x13 in pan and add enough water so there is 1/2 inch of liquid.", "Cover with foil and bake for 45-50 minutes.", "When tenderloin is done, remove to a serving plate and dump water from the pan into the skillet you seared the pork in.", "Boil water and scrape up drippings.", "Pour the cornstarch into a little cold water, mix, and add to drippings.", "Cook until thickened for gravy."]

recipes.ingredients: ["10 lb Beef", "5 lb Pork or possibly mutton fat, (Sheep tail).", "2 Tbsp. Coriander seed grnd", "1/2 x Grated nutmeg", "4 Tbsp. Salt", "2 Tbsp. Grnd cloves", "2 Tbsp. Allspice", "2 Tbsp. Pepper", "2 Tbsp. Chile pwdr or possibly to taste *"]
recipes.steps: ["* Added to the original recipe.", "Mince beef and cut fat into small cubes.", "Mix all ingredients well.", "Cover for one hour.", "Fill large size skins (casings) and tie ends.", "Extract from the Union of South Africa, Dept of Agriculture \"Foods and Praise to the chile gods for giving us Habaneros"]
