recipes.ingredients: ["1 12 lbs hamburger", "14 cup onion, chopped", "1 teaspoon salt", "13 cup parmesan cheese, grated", "14 cup black olives, chopped", "1 teaspoon oregano", "4 -5 slices mozzarella cheese", "1 cup tomato paste"]
recipes.steps: ["Mix first 6 ingredients and grill or pan fry.", "After they are done, add one slice of mozzarella cheese to each.", "Top each with a small amount of tomato paste.", "Serve on toasted french bread!"]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 recipe pizza dough (for 12 inch pizza)", "olive oil (to brush on dough)", "2 garlic cloves, minced (you can use garlic powder )", "1 teaspoon dried basil", "1 teaspoon dried oregano", "1 -1 12 cup zucchini, coarsely-shredded (press and drain off liqui! very important)", "1 large tomatoes, sliced thin (meaty tomato)", "1 (8 ounce) package mozzarella cheese, sliced or 1 (8 ounce) package pre-shredded mozzarella cheese", "parmesan cheese, grated"]
recipes.steps: ["Prepare your dough ( use my dough recipes from my web page or from Dave's recipe archives) Place dough to fit 12 inch pan.", "Brush dough with olive oil, mince over garlic.", "Lay on sliced tomato, sprinkle on spices.", "Scatter on zucchini evenly.", "Sprinkle on cheeses.", "Bake in a hot oven (400-425F) about 20 minutes or until dough is done and cheese has melted."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1- 1/4 cup Organic Pizza Sauce, Divided, Plus Additional For Serving", "1 cup Quinoa (See Note)", "1 cup Green Bell Pepper, Chopped", "13 cups Turkey Pepperonis, Halved", "1 teaspoon Italian Seasoning", "1/2 teaspoons Salt", "Few Pinches Of Pepper", "1- 1/4 cup Reduced Sodium Chicken Broth", "8 ounces, weight Raw 93% Lean Ground Beef", "3/4 cups (packed) Grated Mozzarella Cheese, Plus Additional For Garnish", "1/4 cups (packed) Grated Parmesan Cheese"]
recipes.steps: ["Spray a 5-quart slow cooker with cooking spray and add 1 cup of the pizza sauce (saving the rest for later,) quinoa, green pepper, turkey pepperoni, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper, and stir together.", "Add chicken broth and stir.", "Finally, crumble up ground beef and stir it into the quinoa.", "Set to high heat and cook until liquid is absorbed, quinoa is tender, and beef is cooked, about 23 hours.", "(Mine only took 2.)", "Add remaining 1/4 cup of pizza sauce and cheeses and stir.", "Cover and cook an additional 5 minutes, so the cheese can melt.", "Divide quinoa between plates and drizzle with a little bit of extra pizza sauce and grated mozzarella cheese and devour.", "Note: I made this a few times with the uncolored quinoa, and it was perfect!", "When I had to photograph it, I only had tri-colored quinoa on hand, and it just was not as good.", "So please use the uncolored quinoa in this recipe!"]

recipes.ingredients: ["3 cup flour", "1 packages quick.rise yeast", "1 tsp of sugar", "2 tbsp evoo", "1/2 tsp salt"]
recipes.steps: ["put all the dry ingredients in a mixing bowl and mix well.", "combine 1 cup very warm water and oil.", "Pour slowly into dry ingredients and stir by hand.", "Should be tacky but not sticky.", "I needed a little more water so I just ran my hand under the water and stirred.", "This technique worked fine.", "oil medium size mixing bowl and with the oil on your hand, coat dough and place in bowl and cover with clear wrap.", "I put a rubber band around the clear wrap to keep it tight.", "Let it sit for 45 minutes in a warm dark place.", "*** the recipe is one that was available in ALL YOU magazine.", "Was very easy!!", "!", "I put mine in a large bowl and sit inside an off oven ... until it rises..."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 (15 ounce) boxpillsbury refrigerated pie crusts, softened as directed on box", "1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese (4 oz)", "12 cup sliced pepperoni, chopped (2 oz)", "34 cup pizza sauce or 34 cup tomato sauce", "1 teaspoon italian seasoning"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat oven to 425F", "Remove pie crusts from pouches; place flat on cutting board.", "Cut each crust into 4 wedge-shaped pieces, making 8 wedges.", "In medium bowl, mix filling ingredients.", "Spread 1 heaping tablespoon filling on half of each crust wedge.", "Fold unfilled sides of wedges over filling.", "With fork, press edges to seal.", "Place on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake 11 to 14 minutes or until crust is golden brown."]

recipes.dish_name: Sweet Potato Plum Pizza with Brie
recipes.ingredients: ["1- 1/2 cup Cooked Sweet Potato", "18 teaspoons Cinnamon", "18 teaspoons Nutmeg", "18 teaspoons Ground Cloves", "1/2 teaspoons Vanilla", "1 Tablespoon Honey", "2 whole Plums", "3/4 pounds Brie Cheese", "1 whole Pizza Dough (See Note)", "1/2 cups Craisins"]
recipes.steps: ["Preheat oven to 450 degrees F.", "Combine the sweet potato, spices, vanilla, and honey.", "Thinly slice both the plums and brie cheese.", "Roll out the pizza dough, and bake it for 5 to 8 minutes, until slightly browned and mostly cooked.", "Remove from oven.", "Spread the sweet potato mixture on the pizza crust; top with plum slices.", "Lay the brie cheese slices on top of the plums.", "Bake the pizza until the cheese is melted; 8 to 10 minutes.", "Add craisins and sprinkle with cinnamon if desired.", "Enjoy!", "Note: I use half of a recipe of Honey Whole Wheat Pizza Dough found here in Tasty Kitchen."]

recipes.ingredients: ["Two 1/2-pound balls of Pizza Dough or thawed frozen pizza or bread dough", "Flour, for dusting and rolling", "3/4 pound mixed black and green olives, pitted and coarsely chopped", "2 anchovy fillets, mashed", "1 large garlic clove, minced", "1/2 teaspoon rosemary, finely chopped", "4 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil", "Kosher salt and crushed red pepper"]
recipes.steps: ["Set a pizza stone or heavy baking sheet in the bottom third of the oven.", "Preheat the oven to 550, allowing at least 30 minutes for the stone to heat.", "On a lightly floured work surface, roll 1 ball of dough into a 6-inch round.", "Turn the edges of the dough up slightly to form a lip, then stretch the dough out to a 10-inch round.", "Transfer the dough to a lightly floured pizza peel or upside-down baking sheet.", "In a medium bowl, combine the olives, anchovy fillets, garlic, rosemary and 2 tablespoons of the extra-virgin olive oil.", "Season the tapenade with kosher salt and crushed red pepper.", "Brush the pizza dough with 1 tablespoon of extra-virgin olive oil and slide it onto the hot stone.", "Bake for about 5 minutes, or until the crust is lightly golden and crisp; poke the dough to deflate any bubbles while baking.", "Remove the pizza from the oven and spread half of the tapenade over it to within 1/2 inch of the rim.", "Bake the pizza for 2 minutes longer, or until the crust is golden and crisp.", "Let stand for 5 minutes before cutting into wedges or squares.", "Repeat with the remaining dough and tapenade."]

recipes.ingredients: ["4 gallons Whole Tomatoes (I Pick 4 Ice Cream Pails Full From The Garden)", "8 whole Medium Onions", "2 whole Green Peppers", "1 whole Jalapeno (optional)", "1- 1/2 cup Vegetable Or Canola Oil", "2 cups Sugar", "1/2 cups Pickling Salt", "6 whole Bay Leaves", "2 Tablespoons Each - Oregano, Basil, Parsley Flakes", "3 cans Tomato Paste, 13 Oz. Each", "25 jars Pint-sized Canning Jars, With Lids And Rings"]
recipes.steps: ["Begin by blanching the tomatoes by dropping them in a pot of boiling water for 60 seconds.", "Immediately remove them from the water using a slotted spoon and peel off the skins.", "Blend or process the tomatoes to your desired consistency, and add them to a large stockpot, or 2 large pots.", "Chop, dice, or process the onions and peppers, and add to the pot.", "Heat it up and let it simmer for 1 hour, stirring occasionally.", "If the sauce needs to reduce further, simmer an additional hour.", "Add the remaining ingredients and simmer, stirring often, for 1 more hour.", "Remove the bay leaves.", "Ladle hot sauce into clean, warm, sterilized pint-size canning jars.", "Place clean, boiled lids on top and seal tightly.", "Let set on the counter for 24 hours.", "If any do not seal, store in the freezer.", "This recipe makes about 25 pints."]

recipes.ingredients: ["6 oz. light cream cheese or silken firm or extra-firm tofu, drained", "1/4 cup confectioners sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla extract", "1/2 tsp. grated orange zest", "1/2 fresh peeled and cored pineapple, sliced into rounds", "2 tsp. canola or grapeseed oil for brushing pineapple", "1 Par-Baked Pizza Crust", "3/4 cup fresh blueberries", "1/4 cup chopped unsalted pistachios"]
recipes.steps: ["Blend cream cheese and confectioners sugar in food processor 3 minutes, or until smooth.", "Add vanilla and orange zest, and pulse until combined.", "Brush grill grate well with oil, and preheat grill to medium.", "Brush pineapple with oil, and grill 5 minutes on each side, or until both sides have grill marks.", "Cool until easy to handle, then slice each round into quarters.", "Spread cream cheese mixture over crust, and top with pineapple, blueberries, and pistachios.", "Place pizza on grill, close lid, and grill 5 minutes, or until cream cheese is warmed through and crust is crispy."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 low-carb pita bread", "1 teaspoon tomato sauce", "1 ounce mozzarella cheese", "12 ounce pepperoni (6 slices)"]
recipes.steps: ["Cut the pita open and add 1/2 of the cheese evenly.", "Close and spread the tomato sauce on top.", "Add the rest of the.", "cheese.", "Top with quartered pepperoni slices.", "Micro for 90 seonds.", "Enjoy."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. All-purpose flour", "1/2 tsp Baking soda", "1/2 tsp Salt", "10 Tbsp. Butter, softened", "1/2 c. Granulated sugar", "1/2 c. Firmly packed brown sugar", "1 x Egg", "1/2 tsp Vanilla extract", "1 pkt Nestle toll house semi-sweet chocolate morsels, divided", "1/2 c. Peanut butter", "1 c. Cut-up fruit, such as bananas and strawberries (opt)", "1 c. Minced candy bars, such as nestle crunch bars, butterfinger bars, alpine white bars, goobers and raisinets"]
recipes.steps: ["Preheat oven to 375'F.", "In small bowl, combine flour, baking soda and salt; set aside.", "In large mixer bowl, beat butter, granulated sugar and brown sugar till creamy.", "Beat in egg and vanilla extract.", "Gradually beat in flour mix.", "Stir in 1 c. Nestle Toll House semi-sweet chocolate morsels.", "Spread batter in lightly greased 12\" to 14\" pizza pan or possibly 15 1/2x10 1/2\" jelly-roll pan.", "Bake 20-24 min or possibly till lightly browned.", "Immediately sprinkle remaining 1 c. semi-sweet chocolate morsels over crust; drop peanut butter by spoonfuls onto morsels.", "Let stand 5 min or possibly till soft and shiny.", "Gently spread chocolate and peanut butter over crust.", "Top with fruit and candy.", "Cut into wedges.", "Serve hot.", "Makes about 12 servings."]

recipes.ingredients: ["125 grams Bread (strong) flour", "3 grams Dry yeast", "3 grams Salt", "65 ml Water", "25 grams Olive oil", "7 grams Butter (brought to room temperature)", "1 Onion", "1 dash Salt and pepper", "60 grams Bacon (block)", "75 grams Plain yogurt"]
recipes.steps: ["Make the dough: Combine the bread flour, dry yeast and salt in a bowl, then mix.", "Mix the water and olive oil together and add little by little.", "Knead the dough.", "Add the warmed butter and knead for 5 minutes.", "Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and let sit at room temperature for about 30 minutes.", "Preparing the other ingredients: Cut the onion in thin slices against the grain.", "Lightly fry the onion in oil (not listed), salt and pepper.", "Cut the bacon into 5 cm cubes.", "Roll out the pizza dough and top: Roll the dough into a 20 x 25 cm rectangle and spread with yogurt.", "Scatter the toppings from Step 3 evenly on top.", "Bake the pizza for 20 minutes at 220C."]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese", "2 teaspoons dried Italian seasoning", "2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese", "1 12 cups shredded parmesan cheese", "12 ounces salsa"]
recipes.steps: ["Preheat oven to 350.", "Mix together cream cheese and Italian seasoning.", "Spread into a 9 inch glass pie plate.", "In separate bowl, combine cheeses, sprinkle half over cream cheese mixture.", "Spread salsa over the cheese mixture, then sprinkle rest of cheese on top.", "Bake approximately 20 minutes or until bubbly.", "Serve with French bread or chips."]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 cups cream", "2 cups milk", "2 cups mozzarella cheese", "1 cup parmesan cheese", "12 cup processed cheese, like Velveeta", "12 cup pepperoni, cut into halves", "12 cup mushroom, cut into bite sized pieces", "12 cup grape tomatoes, cut into half", "14 cup black olives, sliced thin", "2 teaspoons flour", "1 teaspoon salt", "12 teaspoon pepper", "2 cups pasta, use your favorite shape", "12 cup breadcrumbs"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat a large sauce pan to medium low heat.", "Add milk, ceam, mozzarrella, velveeta, flour, and 1/2 cup Parmesean cheese.", "Melt slowly stirring frequently.", "Be careful not to burn.", "Once melted, add salt and pepper to season.", "Cook on medium low for another 5-10 minutes until the sauce is thickened and fully melted.", "Mix together the Pepperoni, mushrooms, tomatoes, pasta, and olives in a large bowl.", "Pour the Cheese mixture over the pizza ingredients, into the bowl.", "MIx until well incorporated.", "Season again if necessary.", "Pour the entire mixture into a 13x9 inch casserole dish.", "Top with sprinkles of bread crumbs and remaining Parmesean Cheese.", "Bake at 350 for 20-30 minutes, until top is golden brown and edges are bubbling."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 12 lbs hamburger", "12 teaspoon garlic powder", "12 teaspoon salt", "2 loaves French bread, split down center and each cut into 4 pieces", "1 (8 ounce) jarprocess cheese sauce", "1 (4 ounce) can mushroom pieces (optional)", "1 cup chopped green onion", "1 (4 ounce) cansliced jalapenos (optional)", "1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce", "12 cup grated parmesan cheese", "4 cups shredded mozzarella cheese"]
recipes.steps: ["In skillet, cook beef until no longer pink.", "Drain.", "Stir in garlic powder and salt.", "Place each bread on a heavy duty foil piece.", "This will be used to wrap after assembling.", "Spread bread with cheese sauce.", "Top with beef mix, mushrooms, onions, jallepenos.", "Drizzle with pizza sauce.", "Top with parm and mozz cheeses.", "Wrap and freeze up to 3 months.", "To Bake: Unwrap loaves and place on baking sheet at 350 for 25 minutes.", "(You could also thaw these in fridge first and then bake for 18 minutes, but my teenagers won't allow time for this)."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 dash pita bread, cut in half", "1/4 cup tomato sauce, low sodium", "1/8 cup yellow onions, chopped", "1/8 cup scallions, chopped", "1/8 cup green bell peppers, chopped", "4 mushrooms, sliced", "1/8 cup alfalfa sprouts"]
recipes.steps: ["Cut the pita bread in half by separating it into two circles.", "Spread each half with tomato sauce.", "Sprinkle on the basil and oregano and add the toppings of your choice.", "Bake at 300F for 10 minutes, or heat in toaster oven for 5 minutes at 250F setting."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1/4 recipe Perfect Parmesan Pizza Dough", "1 cup CLASSICO Traditional Pizza Sauce", "1-1/2 cups KRAFT Shredded Four Cheese, divided", "1 cup broccoli florets, blanched", "1/4 cup each sliced red, yellow and green pepper", "1/4 cup sliced black olives"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat oven to 450 degrees F.", "Roll Perfect Parmesan Pizza Dough into 12-inch round on lightly floured surface.", "Transfer to baking sheet sprayed with cooking spray.", "Spread dough with sauce to within 1/2 inch of edge; top 1-1/4 cups cheese, broccoli, peppers and olives.", "Bake 10 min.", "Top with remaining cheese; bake 8 to10 min.", "or until cheese is melted and edge of crust is golden brown."]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 tomatoes, seeded and diced King Sooper's 1 lb For $0.99 thru 02/09", "1 cup Cracker Barrel Part-Skim Mozzarella Cheese, shredded", "1/4 cup Kraft 100% Parmesan Light Grated Cheese", "1/2 cup Miracle Whip Calorie-Wise Spread Family Dollar $3.50 thru 02/07", "1 tsp. each: minced garlic & oregano, leaves", "2 whole-grain bagels, cut in half horizontally"]
recipes.steps: ["MIX tomatoes, cheeses, dressing & spices together in a small bowl.", "SPREAD bagels with mixture.", "BROIL until melted and lightly browned."]

recipes.dish_name: Mozzarella and Fresh Basil Grilled Pizza Recipe
recipes.ingredients: ["14 ounces Basic Grilled Pizza Dough", "Olive oil, for brushing", "Kosher salt, for sprinkling", "2/3 cup Basic Pizza Sauce", "8 ounces part-skim mozzarella cheese, sliced into 1/4-inch-thick slices", "8 to 10 large basil leaves, torn in half"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat half of a gas or charcoal grill to high (about 400 degrees F) and the other half to low (about 300 degrees F).", "Divide dough in 1/2 and roll into 2 rounds about 1/4 inch thick and 10 inches in diameter.", "Brush the top of 1 round with olive oil and sprinkle with salt.", "Lay dough oiled side down on the hotter half of the grill and brush the top with oil and sprinkle with salt.", "Grill dough without moving until grill marks form on the bottom, about 2 minutes.", "Flip dough with a spatula or tongs to the cooler half of grill.", "Spread 1/2 of the sauce evenly over dough and arrange 1/2 of the mozzarella on top.", "Cover and grill, rotating if necessary to avoid any hot spots, until dough is lightly charred and cheese is melted, about 8 to 10 minutes.", "Transfer pizza to a cutting board, top with 1/2 of the basil leaves, slice, and serve.", "Repeat with second round of dough and remaining toppings."]

recipes.dish_name: Smoked Duck Pizza with Hoisin Recipe
recipes.ingredients: ["1 (11-inch) premade pizza crust or flatbread, such as Boboli, baked and cooled", "1/4 cup hoisin sauce", "1/2 medium red onion, halved and sliced paper thin", "1/4 pound smoked duck breast, thinly sliced", "3 ounces shredded Monterey Jack cheese (about 1 cup)", "2 tablespoons coarsely chopped fresh cilantro leaves", "Red pepper flakes (optional)"]
recipes.steps: ["Line the bottom of the oven with aluminum foil and heat to 450 degrees F.", "Brush pizza crust with hoisin sauce and top with red onion.", "Arrange smoked duck breast in a circle and top with cheese.", "Place pizza directly on the oven rack and bake until golden and crisp, about 5 to 7 minutes.", "Top with cilantro and red pepper flakes (if using), cut into small squares (if serving as an hors doeuvre), and serve."]

recipes.ingredients: ["12 yellow onion, diced", "3 green onions, diced", "4 mushrooms, chopped", "2 garlic cloves, minced", "1 teaspoon butter", "12 pepperoni slices, diced", "1 tablespoon fresh basil, chopped", "12 teaspoon kosher salt", "1 dash black pepper", "5 eggs, beaten", "12 cup ready-made bruschetta, drained", "14 cup parmesan cheese, grated", "fresh mozzarella ball (nickle size, halfed)"]
recipes.steps: ["Preheat oven to 350F.", "Saute onions in butter til golden.", "Add mushrooms and garlic and saute 1 minute more.", "Set aside to cool.", "Mix all ingredients together (except mozzarella balls.)", "Be sure veggie mixture has cooled slightly before adding to egg mixture.", "Spoon into a lightly greased mini muffin tin.", "Insert 1/2 small fresh mozzarella ball in the middle of each bite.", "Bake for 30 minutes."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 (8 ounce) can refrigerated crescent dinner rolls", "2 tablespoons grated parmesan cheese", "13 cup finely chopped pepperoni (about 1 1/2 oz)", "2 tablespoons finely chopped green bell peppers", "12 cup shredded Italian cheese blend (2 oz)", "12 cup pizza sauce (from 8-oz can)"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat oven to 350F Spray cookie sheet with cooking spray.", "Unroll dough and separate into 4 rectangles; firmly press perforations to seal.", "Sprinkle Parmesan cheese, pepperoni, bell pepper and Italian cheese blend over each rectangle.", "Starting with one short side, roll up each rectangle; press edge to seal.", "With serrated knife or dental floss, cut each roll into 6 slices; place cut side down on cookie sheet.", "Bake 13 to 17 minutes or until edges are golden brown.", "Meanwhile, heat pizza sauce.", "Immediately remove pinwheels from cookie sheet.", "Serve warm with warm pizza sauce for dipping.", "EXCHANGES: 1/2 Starch; 1/2 Fat."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 12 lbs lean ground beef (at least 80%)", "1 small onion, finely chopped (1/4 cup)", "14 cup regular beer or 14 cup non-alcoholic beer", "1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce", "1 teaspoon salt", "14 teaspoon pepper", "2 garlic cloves, finely chopped", "6 rye meal or 6 whole wheat hamburger buns, split", "ketchup, if desired (optional)", "pickle, planks if desired (optional)"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat gas or charcoal grill.", "In medium bowl, mix all ingredients except buns, ketchup and pickles.", "Shape mixture into 6 patties, about 3/4 inch thick.", "Place patties on grill rack over medium heat.", "Cover grill; cook 10 to 15 minutes, turning once, until meat thermometer inserted in center of patties reads 160 degrees F. Add buns, cut sides down, for last 4 minutes of grilling or until toasted.", "Top burgers with ketchup and pickle planks; serve on buns."]

recipes.ingredients: ["Eight 1/2-inch thick slices country-style sourdough bread", "12 ounces Monterey jack, farmhouse cheddar, Gruyere, or imported Swiss cheese, thinly sliced", "3 tablespoons unsalted butter", "Add ins: (Choose one)", "8 slices smoked bacon, cooked and broken into 1-inch pieces", "2 vine-ripened tomatoes, sliced, and drained on paper towels for 5 minutes", "8 slices baked ham", "Copyright 2001 Television Food Network, G.P. All rights reserved"]
recipes.steps: ["Place 4 slices of bread on a cutting board.", "Lay half the cheese slices on the bread.", "Lay the bacon, tomato, or ham on top of the cheese.", "Cover with the remaining cheese.", "Top with the remaining slices of bread and press down slightly.", "Heat a large skillet over medium-low heat and melt a tablespoon of the butter.", "Carefully place 2 of the sandwiches in the pan, and cook until the bread browns and the cheese is slightly melted, about 5 minutes.", "Turn the sandwiches with a spatula and add a small hazelnut-size piece of butter to the pan.", "Cook until the other side of the sandwiches is toasted and the cheese is melted, about 3 to 5 minutes more.", "Repeat with the other sandwiches.", "(If at any time the bread starts to brown too quickly, lower the heat to prevent the bread from scorching before the cheese melts.)", "Serve."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 lb ground beef", "1 (10 1/2 ounce) can condensed chicken gumbo soup", "1 teaspoon prepared mustard", "2 tablespoons ketchup", "6 hamburger buns or 6 sliced French bread"]
recipes.steps: ["Brown ground beef and pour off excess fat.", "Add remaining ingredients, and cook over low heat for 15 minutes.", "Serve over sliced french bread or hamburger buns."]

recipes.ingredients: ["24 each 80% lean ground beef patties (6 oz. each)", "24 slices Swiss cheese slices (1 oz. each) Target 2 For $5.00 thru 02/06", "- pastrami, thinly sliced", "24 each KRAFT Thousand Island Dressings, split, toasted", "3 cups A.1. Thick & Hearty Steak Sauce, divided", "24 each leaf lettuce", "8 each tomatoes, each cut into 6 slices Safeway 1 lb For $1.29 thru 02/09", "3 cups canned sauerkraut, well drained", "3 cups KRAFT Thousand Island Dressing"]
recipes.steps: ["For each serving: Grill 1 beef patty on medium-high heat 2 to 3 min.", "on each side or to medium (160 degrees F), or desired doneness.", "Top with 1 cheese slice and 1 oz.", "pastrami.", "Grill 30 sec.", "or until cheese begins to melt and pastrami is warmed.", "Spread bottom half of roll with 1 Tbsp.", "steak sauce; top with 1 lettuce leaf, 2 tomato slices, 2 Tbsp.", "sauerkraut and 1 Tbsp.", "dressing.", "Cover with cheeseburger, 1 Tbsp.", "of the remaining steak sauce and top of roll."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 lb extra firm tofu", "1 cup barbecue sauce", "4 whole wheat hoagie rolls", "sauteed onion", "diced bell pepper"]
recipes.steps: ["Drain the tofu and cut it in half horizontally to make two pieces.", "Wrap the tofu in a clean towel, press it between two baking sheets with a weight on top, and refrigerate for an hour or more.", "Unwrap the tofu and place it in a shallow baking dish.", "Spoon 1/2 cup of the barbecue sauce over the tofu, cover the baking dish, and let the tofu marinate in the refrigerator for at least several hours.", "The longer the tofu marinates (up to five days), the more flavorful it will be.", "Place the marinated tofu on a lightly oiled baking sheet, and bake at 400 degrees for 1 hour.", "Slice the sandwich rolls open, cut the tofu into thin slices, and divide it among the rolls.", "Mix the sauteed onions, bell peppers, or your favorite fixings with the remaining barbecue sauce, and spoon over the sandwiches."]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 tablespoons brown spicy mustard", "3 tablespoons balsamic vinegar", "1/2 cup olive oil", "1 teaspoon kosher salt", "1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper", "1 teaspoon hot sauce", "4 portobello mushroom caps", "4 slices Gouda cheese", "1/2 cup mayonnaise", "4 hamburger rolls", "1 red onion, sliced", "4 leaves butter lettuce", "1 tomato, sliced"]
recipes.steps: ["Combine marinade ingredients.", "Place caps into a baking dish and pour marinade over top.", "Use a brush to make sure all caps are covered with the marinade.", "Set aside and let marinate up to 2 hours.", "Remove the portobellos from marinade (do not discard marinade) and place gill side down on a preheated gas, electric or charcoal grill over medium-high heat.", "Grill 3 to 4 minutes per side.", "Top each cap with cheese 2 minutes to melt before they are finished grilling.", "In a medium bowl combine 1/2 cup mayonnaise and 2 tablespoons of the marinade.", "Spread the flavored mayonnaise onto each bun and top with portobellos.", "Serve with sliced onion, lettuce and tomato."]

recipes.ingredients: ["12 round buttery crackers", "2 oz. KRAFT Hot Habanero Cheese, cut lengthwise into 6 slices, then crosswise in half", "1 fresh pineapple slice (1/2 inch thick), cut into 6 pieces", "6 sprigs fresh cilantro"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat oven to 350 degrees F.", "Place crackers in single layer on baking sheet; top with cheese.", "Bake 3 to 5 min.", "or until cheese is melted.", "Place pineapple and cilantro on 6 topped crackers; cover with cheese-topped crackers, cheese sides down, to make 6 cracker sandwiches."]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 1/2 lb Ground Turkey breast", "1/2 packages Frozen Spinach", "1 cup Feta Cheese", "1 dash salt n pepper", "1 tsp minced garlic", "1 1/2 tsp olive oil"]
recipes.steps: ["Thaw frozen spinach.", "Place in medium pan with olive oil and garlic.", "Cook until warmed through.", "Set aside to cool.", "Place seasoned ground meat with salt n pepper into a medium bowl.", "Add feta cheese and cooled spinach to bowl.", "Mix just enough so everything is incorporated.", "DO NOT OVER MIX.", "Meat becomes rough.", "Make the burgers any size you would like.", "Try not to handle the meat too much.", "Turkey meat tends to be more difficult to handle.", "You can either cook the burgers on the grill, on the stove top with some Pam spray OR in the oven.", "(For the oven, 350F for about 20-25 mins.)", "Once they are cooked to moist perfection, either it eat on it's own or in a wheat bun!"]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 medium red pepper, chopped", "4 green onions, thinly sliced", "1 Tbsp. olive oil", "1 can (15 oz.) black beans, drained, rinsed", "1 cup water", "1/3 cup TACO BELL Thick & Chunky Salsa", "1 tsp. ground cumin", "1 cup instant brown rice, uncooked", "8 flour tortillas, (6 inch)", "3/4 cup KRAFT 2% Milk Shredded Sharp Cheddar Cheese", "2 Tbsp. chopped cilantro"]
recipes.steps: ["Cook and stir peppers and onions in hot oil in large skillet on low heat for 5 minutes.", "Add beans, water, salsa and cumin; mix well.", "Bring to boil.", "Stir in rice.", "Reduce heat to medium-low; cover.", "Cook 5 minutes.", "Remove from heat; stir.", "Cover and let stand 5 minutes.", "Spoon evenly onto tortillas; sprinkle with cheese and cilantro.", "Roll up."]

recipes.dish_name: Short Rib Sandwiches with Horseradish Mayonnaise
recipes.ingredients: ["Vegetable oil, for brushing", "1 large Spanish onion, cut into 8 thick slices", "3 pounds Red Wine Braised Short Ribs", "4 kaiser rolls, split", "1/2 cup mayonnaise", "2 tablespoons drained horseradish", "Salt and freshly ground pepper"]
recipes.steps: ["In a medium saucepan, reheat the short ribs in their sauce until warmed through.", "Transfer the ribs to a plate and bring the sauce to a boil.", "Remove from the heat and keep warm.", "Light a grill or preheat a grill pan.", "Lightly brush the grate or grill pan with oil.", "Grill the onion over the cooler part of the fire until lightly charred, about 5 minutes per side.", "Transfer to a plate.", "Grill the ribs over a hot fire until browned, about 45 seconds per side.", "Transfer to a work surface and cut into thick slices; discard the bones.", "Cover with foil.", "Toast the rolls on the grill or in the grill pan.", "In a bowl, combine the mayonnaise and horseradish; season with salt and pepper.", "Spread the rolls with the mayonnaise, top with the onion and short ribs and drizzle with sauce.", "Serve with the remaining sauce on the side."]

recipes.ingredients: ["8 ground beef patties (2 lb.)", "2 Tbsp. olive oil", "3 sweet onions (2 lb.), thinly sliced, separated into rings Safeway 1 lb For $1.49 thru 02/09", "1/4 cup MIRACLE WHIP Dressing", "3 Tbsp. A.1. Original Sauce", "8 kaiser rolls, partially split", "2 tomatoes, each cut into 8 slices King Sooper's 1 lb For $0.99 thru 02/09", "8 KRAFT Singles"]
recipes.steps: ["Grill or broil beef patties until done (160 degrees F).", "Meanwhile, heat oil in large nonstick skillet on medium-high heat.", "Add onions; cook and stir 10 min.", "or until golden brown.", "Stir in dressing and steak sauce.", "Fill rolls with tomatoes, burgers, Singles and onion mixture."]

recipes.ingredients: ["- PHILADELPHIA Original Cream Cheese, softened", "1-1/2 cups walnuts, chopped", "1-1/2 cups sun-dried tomatoes, finely chopped", "24 each 80% lean ground beef patties (6 oz. each) Safeway 1 lb For $3.99 thru 02/09", "2-1/4 cups A.1. Thick & Hearty Steak Sauce, divided", "24 each ciabatta rolls, split, toasted"]
recipes.steps: ["Beat cream cheese in 6-qt.", "bowl of mixer 1 min.", "or until creamy.", "(Or for trial recipe, stir by hand until creamy.)", "Stir in nuts and tomatoes; set aside.", "For each serving: Grill 1 beef patty on medium-high heat 2 to 3 min.", "on each side or to medium (160 degrees F), or desired doneness.", "Top with #30 scoop of cream cheese mixture.", "Grill 30 sec.", "or until cheese is softened; spread cream cheese mixture evenly over burger.", "Spread bottom of roll with 1/2 Tbsp.", "steak sauce; top with cheeseburger and 1 Tbsp.", "of the remaining steak sauce.", "Cover with top of roll."]

recipes.dish_name: Chevre Stuffed Lamb Burgers with Raspberry Sauce
recipes.ingredients: ["2 lbs (.9 kg). ground lean lamb", "salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste", "8 oz (224 grm). soft mild chevre", "1-1/2 cups (350 ml) fresh mint leaves", "1/3 cup (80 ml) white wine vinegar", "2 tbsp (30 ml). raspberry vinegar", "1 tbsp (15 ml). fresh lemon juice", "3 tbsp (45 ml) superfine sugar", "salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste"]
recipes.steps: ["Season the ground lamb to taste with salt and pepper and divide the meat into 8 equal parts.", "Shape about 1 oz (28 grm).", "of the chevre into a round nugget and mold 1 part of the lamb around the chevre, enclosing it completely; then shape it into a thick patty.", "Repeat with the remaining lamb and chevre.", "Make the mint sauce.", "Broil or grill the lamb burgers to desired doneness.", "Serve each burger with a few tbsp of the mint sauce.", "Combine all ingredients together until sugar is dissolved.", "(I like to make this 24 hours in advance and chill prior to use)."]

recipes.ingredients: ["4 flour tortillas (6 inch)", "1/4 cup TACO BELL 99% Fat Free Refried Beans", "1/4 cup TACO BELL Thick & Chunky Salsa", "12 slices OSCAR MAYER Deli Fresh Smoked Ham", "2 KRAFT 2% Milk Pepperjack Singles, cut in half Target 2 For $5.00 thru 02/06", "1 Tbsp. coarsely chopped cilantro"]
recipes.steps: ["Spread tortillas evenly with beans.", "Top evenly with salsa, ham, Singles and cilantro.", "Roll up and serve."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 lb Hamburger", "1 lb Itilian sausage. I bought the links and took the meat out of the casings.", "1/4 cup Diced onion", "1 jar of spaghetti sauce", "12 slice Of mozerella or provolone cheese", "6 Sub buns"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat pan to med.", "Heat.", "Add hambuger, sausage, and onion.", "Cook until brown.", "Heat oven to 400", "Add sauce to meat.", "Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 to 15 mins.", "Scoop disired amount of meat into sub buns.", "Top with 2 slices of cheese to each sub.", "Bake for about 5 mins or until cheese is melted."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 pound ground beef, extra lean ground", "1 x salt and black pepper", "2 tablespoons butter or margarine", "1 cup onions sliced", "3 tablespoons ketchup", "1 1/2 tablespoons prepared mustard", "4 each hamburger buns split,, toasted and buttered", "1 x pickles, dill slices", "1 x onion slices", "1 x lettuce leaves", "1 x tomatoes slices"]
recipes.steps: ["Mix the ground beef and the salt and pepper together in a bowl, blending well.", "Shape into 4 patties about 1/4 inch thick.", "Place the patties on a grill 4 to 6 inches from the heat over grey-hot coals.", "Grill about 4 minutes on each side or to the desired doneness.", "Meanwhile, on the same grill in a small saucepan, melt the butter and add the 1 cup of sliced onion.", "Cook until crisp tender.", "Remove the onion with a slotted spoon and reserve.", "Stir the ketchup and mustard into the butter left in the sauce pan and heat to serving temperature.", "When the hamburgers are done, place each one on a toasted bottom, and top first with some of the cooked onion and then a dollop of the ketchup-mustard mixture and then garnish as desired."]

recipes.ingredients: ["250 g butter", "250 g sugar", "4 eggs", "250 g cake flour", "12 g baking powder"]
recipes.steps: ["Using a medium size bowl, With bare hands, mix butter and sugar.", "continue until light in color.", "Add eggs one by one.", "In a separate bowl, mix cake flour and baking powder.", "Add gradually to butter mixture using a cut and fold motion.", "Using a 2 round baking pans (8-inch), brush with shortening and dust little flour.", "Divide the mixture and pour into pans.", "Even out using pastry scraper.", "Bake in 170C for 15 minutes.", "Check with wooden toothpick.", "Even out both baked cakes using a bread knife.", "Fill in one baked cake with jam.", "And place other cake on top.", "Dust with powdered sugar."]

recipes.ingredients: ["whole chestnuts, 1 can", "1 lb bacon", "24 large scallops", "34 cup ketchup", "peach baby food, 1 jar", "14 cup sugar", "14 cup soy sauce", "14 cup maple syrup"]
recipes.steps: ["Mix soy sauce and Maple Syrup together and add scallops.", "Soak for 6 hours in the Refrig.", "Cut each piece of bacon in half and add scallop and waterchest nut.", "If the scallops are to big cut them in half.", "Roll and fasten with a tooth pick.", "Broil for 5 minutes.", "While these are broiling mix ketchup and peach baby food and sugar.", "Brush on top of bacon broiler for 3 to 5 minutes longer."]

recipes.ingredients: ["4 BOCA All American Flamed Grilled Veggie Burgers", "4 KRAFT 2% Milk Singles Target 2 For $5.00 thru 02/06", "4 lettuce leaves", "4 tomato slices Safeway 1 lb For $1.29 thru 02/09", "4 whole wheat hamburger buns", "4 tsp. GREY POUPON Dijon Mustard"]
recipes.steps: ["Cook burgers in skillet as directed on package.", "Top with 2% Milk Singles; cover.", "Cook 15 to 20 sec.", "or until Singles begin to melt.", "Fill buns with lettuce, tomatoes, cheeseburgers and mustard."]

recipes.ingredients: ["3 lbs ground chuck", "13 cup low sodium soy sauce", "2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce", "1 teaspoon onion powder", "12 teaspoon garlic powder", "12 teaspoon black pepper", "13 cup flour", "12 hamburger buns"]
recipes.steps: ["Add your ground, soy and worcestershire sauce to a large bowl and mix by hand a few times.", "Mix your dry ingredients together and add to your ground mixture.", "Mix by hand until well incorporated.", "I usually flip the meat over in the bowl a few times because the flour will lay in the bottom.", "Make your burgers a little larger in diameter than your buns.", "Important step: When you are finished making the burger push you're index finger thru the middle of it up to the middle knuckle to make a small hole.", "This hole will fill in as the burger cooks (shrinks).", "You're burgers will be nice and flat and not rise up in the middle like little saucers when finished.", "Cook on a medium/high grill direct heat or in a pan over medium heat for approximately 6 to 8 minutes per side depending on how well you like your burgers done.", "Serve with toppings of your choice.", "We usually put cheese on our burgers then nuke them for 30 seconds to melt the cheese before we add the rest of our toppings.", "Enjoy."]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 pounds Pot Roast", "10 ounces, fluid Beef Broth", "10 ounces, fluid Beef Consomme", "10 ounces, fluid French Onion Soup", "6 whole Sandwich Rolls", "6 slices Provolone Cheese"]
recipes.steps: ["Cut roast into medium size chunks.", "Mix broth, consomme and soup in the crockpot.", "Add roast.", "Cook on low for 8-10 hours.", "Shred meat with a fork.", "Warm or toast bread.", "Place meat on rolls, top with cheese and serve with the juices from the crockpot.", "Recipe adapted from Crockin Girls."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 medium (1 cup) mango, coarsely chopped", "2 tablespoons finely chopped red bell pepper", "1 tablespoon finely chopped red onion", "1 small (2 teaspoons) jalapeno chile pepper, seeded, finely chopped", "1 teaspoon finely chopped fresh cilantro", "4 Kaiser rolls, split", "4 lettuce leaves", "8 (3/4-ounce) slices Land O Lakes Deli American", "6 ounces thinly sliced deli turkey breast"]
recipes.steps: ["Combine all mango salsa ingredients in small bowl.", "Refrigerate 1 hour or until flavors are combined.", "Layer bottom half of each roll with 1 lettuce leaf, 1 slice cheese, 1/4 turkey, 1 slice cheese and 1/4 cup mango salsa.", "Place top half of roll over salsa."]

recipes.ingredients: ["23 cup beer", "13 cup vegetable oil", "1 teaspoon salt", "1 garlic clove, slivered", "12 teaspoon pepper", "2 lbs flank steaks", "2 tablespoons butter", "12 teaspoon salt", "12 teaspoon paprika", "4 cups onions, sliced", "14 cup mushroom, sliced", "12 ounces sour cream", "1 teaspoon horseradish", "12 slices French bread"]
recipes.steps: ["Combine beer, oil, salt , garlic and pepper in large bowl.", "Add meat and marinate covered, overnight.", "Drain meat.", "Grill or broil meat till desired amount of doneness.", "In medium saucepan, melt butter with paprika and salt.", "Add onions and mushrooms, cook until onions are tender.", "Remove from heat and stir in sour cream and horseradish.", "Slice meat into thin strips.", "Lightly toast bread.", "Place meat over toast, cover with sour cream sauce.", "sprinkle with paprika."]

recipes.dish_name: Low calorie strawberry honey cream cheese sandwich
recipes.ingredients: ["2 thin slice of whole wheat bread. I like sarah lees 45 calorie bread.", "2 medium strawberries rinsed and sliced", "1/4 tsp honey", "1 zest of orange", "1 tbsp Cream cheese room temperature"]
recipes.steps: ["Mix cream cheese, honey, and orange zest in small bowl", "Spread on both sides of bread", "Place sliced strawberries on top of cream cheese", "Close sandwich and enjoy!", "Variation: butter outside of sandwich with butter replacement(I like a yogurt based spread) and grill over medium heat flipping once until golden brown"]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 14 lbs ground beef", "12 lb chorizo sausage, coarsely chopped (bulk or if links, remove casings)", "12 cup shredded monterey jack cheese", "1 (4 ounce) can mild green chilies, drained", "12-1 cup red onion, finely diced (to taste)", "salt and pepper", "4 -6 hamburger buns", "prepared guacamole"]
recipes.steps: ["With a light hand mix together ground beef, sausage, cheese, green chilies and onion.", "Season with salt and pepper and form into 4-6 patties.", "Grill or broil burgers to desired doneness.", "Serve hot topped with guacamole on toasted burger buns."]

recipes.ingredients: ["8 oz (224 grm). Cream Cheese", "1/3 cup (80 ml) confectioner's sugar", "3 tbsp (45 ml) poppy seeds", "8 oz (224 grm). almond paste", "3 tbsp (45 ml) unsalted butter, softened", "finely grated zest of 1 orange", "optional: sliced almonds for garnish", "1/4 lb (.1 kg). prosciutto or Wesphalian ham", "1/2 cup (125 ml) honey mustard"]
recipes.steps: ["For all three fillings, use croissant dough rolled out and ready to fill and roll to bake OR as an easier and more convenient way, use Pillsbury's Cresent Rolls.", "Place cream cheese and confectioner's sugar in a food processor fitted with a steel blade.", "Process together until smooth, scraping down the sides of the workbowl with a spatula as mecessary.", "Add poppy seeds and process until throughly incorporated.", "Spread a generous 1 tbsp (15 ml) across the wider edge of each croissant before rolling it up and baking according to croissant recipe (or Pillsbury) directions for rolls.", "Beat together the almond paste and butter with an electric mixer until well blended.", "Add the orange zest and beat to incorporate.", "Spread the filling in a thin snake-like line across the wider edge of each croissant (or Pillsbury cresent roll) before, and then roll it up.", "Top each formed croissant with a scattering of sliced almonds, if desired and bake according to roll directions.", "Spread a generous coating of mustard over the surface of each croissant (or Pillsbury cresent roll) to within 1/4 inch of the edges.", "Top with 1 slice of ham, them roll it up and bake according to the roll directions."]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 slices multi-grain bread", "2 Kraft Singles Light Cheese Slice Target 2 For $5.00 thru 02/06", "2 thin slices tomato King Sooper's 1 lb For $0.99 thru 02/09", "2 tsp. non-hydrogenated margarine", "1/2 cup baby carrots Target 2 lb For $3.00 thru 02/06", "1/2 cup sugar snap peas"]
recipes.steps: ["Top 1 of the bread slices with Singles and tomatoes; cover with remaining bread slice.", "Spread outside of sandwich with margarine.", "Cook in skillet on medium heat 2 to 3 min.", "on each side or until golden brown on both sides.", "Serve with vegetables."]

recipes.ingredients: ["4 cups fresh mango, chopped", "2 cups fresh young coconut meat", "1 pinch cayenne", "1 pinch sea salt", "14 cup cilantro, roughly chopped"]
recipes.steps: ["Place all ingredients except cilantro in large container.", "Blend well until smooth.", "Spread mixture thinly on Teflex sheets and sprinkle with cilantro.", "Dehydrate 4 hours, until dry but still very pliable.", "Cut each sheet into 4 squares."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 tablespoon olive oil", "1 small onion, finely chopped", "2 teaspoons cumin seeds", "225 g spinach leaves", "1 tablespoon hot curry paste", "2 (400 g) cans chickpeas, drained", "2 tablespoons crunchy peanut butter", "25 g fresh white breadcrumbs", "salt & freshly ground black pepper", "vegetable oil, for shallow oil", "hamburger buns or salad greens, to serve"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat the olive oil in a large fry pan and cook the onion for 2-3 minutes until beginning to soften.", "Add the cumin seeds, cook for 1 minute and then add the spinach and cook over a high heat for 5 minutes until the spinach has wilted and any water released has evaporated.", "Stir in the curry paste and remove from heat.", "Place the chickpeas in a food processor with the peanut butter and whizz until a thick paste.", "Add the spinach mixture and some seasoning and pulse until well blended.", "Using damp hands, shape the mixture into 6 even sized cakes.", "Wipe out the frying pan with kitchen paper and heat 2 Tbs of the vegetable oil.", "Cook the burgers in batches for 4-5 minutes on each side until golden brown.", "Serve warm, sandwhiched in a bread or bun with a stack of fresh salad."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 whole Sweet Potato, Cut Into Thin Sticks", "3 Tablespoons Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Divided", "1 teaspoon Ground Cumin", "1 teaspoon Chili Powder", "4 sprigs Fresh Thyme, Divided (2 Sprigs Chopped)", "1/2 teaspoons Coarse Salt", "1/2 teaspoons Freshly Ground Pepper", "1 Tablespoon Fresh Rosemary, Chopped", "2 cloves Garlic, Minced", "1/4 cups Fresh Lemon Juice", "2 whole Portobello Mushrooms, Lightly Cleaned Of Any Grit Or Dirt", "2 whole Peaches, Halved And Pits Removed", "2 whole Hamburger Buns (of Your Choice)", "1/2 cups Cherry Tomatoes", "1 whole Scallion, Sliced", "1 cup Arugula"]
recipes.steps: ["Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Toss sweet potato sticks with 2 tablespoons olive oil, cumin, chili powder, 2 thyme sprigs, salt and pepper.", "Bake for 45 minutes, checking after 30 minutes.", "For the mushroom marinade, combine the remaining 1 tablespoon oil, remaining thyme (chopped), rosemary, garlic, lemon juice and pinch of salt and pepper in a small bowl.", "Brush each side of the mushrooms and peaches.", "Preheat the grill to medium-high.", "Grill each mushroom on each side for about 3 to 4 minutes.", "Same rule goes for the peaches.", "Continue to brush with the marinade.", "Grill up the buns, too!", "Serve the burgers with cherry tomatoes, scallions and arugula.", "And sweet potato fries."]

recipes.ingredients: ["6 -8 large tortillas", "16 ounces soften cream cheese", "1 cup prepared salsa", "1 cup shredded cheese (mexican flavored adds a kick)", "1 package taco seasoning"]
recipes.steps: ["Cream together cream cheese and salsa.", "Start with half a package of taco seasoning and taste.", "Add more to your preference.", "Fold in cheese.", "Spread a large spoonful onto each tortilla and roll up like a skinny burrito.", "Refrigerate well.", "With a SHARP knife cut into 1-1 1/2\" segments.", "Proceed to eat anything that oozes out.", "Serve with sour cream and guacomole if desired."]

recipes.ingredients: ["3 12 lbs ground chuck", "1 medium onion", "1 tablespoon liquid smoke", "1 tablespoon k.c.masterpice barbecue sauce", "1 tablespoon hot sauce", "your favorite beer"]
recipes.steps: ["Put the ground chuck in a bowl.", "Mix in the liquid smoke, hot sauce, and bbq sauce.", "Mix together and set in the fridge for awhile-the longer you can let it set in the fridge the better it is.", "Slice the onion.", "Take a small amount of the burger mix and flatten it out.", "Lay a slice of onion on it then take more burger mix and put it over the top of the onion.", "Seal around the edges.", "Make them about 1/3 to a half pound burgers.", "Put them on the grill and baste with bbq sauce and a little beer mixed in it, to thin it out (you may drink the rest of the beer if you are 21).", "Cook about 7 minutes per side.", "These are ever so good!"]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 tbsp. canola oil", "1 lb. ground turkey", "2 tsp. jerk seasoning", "3 finely chopped green onions", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. plain Greek yogurt", "2 chopped green onions", "1 mango", "4 toasted buns"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat canola oil in 12-inch skillet on medium-high.", "Meanwhile, in large bowl, mix ground turkey, jerk seasoning, 3 finely chopped green onions, and 1/2 teaspoon salt; form into 1/2-inch-thick patties.", "Cook 10 minutes, turning over once, or just until cooked through (165 degrees F).", "Meanwhile, in small bowl, mix plain Greek yogurt, 2 chopped green onions, and chopped mango.", "Serve burgers on 4 toasted buns with Bibb lettuce and mango-yogurt sauce."]

recipes.ingredients: ["12 slices OSCAR MAYER Light Bologna", "8 slices whole wheat bread, toasted", "1/4 cup KRAFT Light Mayo Reduced Fat Mayonnaise", "8 pieces lettuce leaves", "4 medium apples", "20 baby carrots", "24 oz. nonfat yogurt, favorite flavor", "4 pouches , or 32 fl oz (4 cups) drinking water"]
recipes.steps: ["Build each sandwich with 3 slices bologna, 2 slices bread, 1 Tbsp.", "mayo and 2 lettuce leaves.", "On the side, enjoy an apple, 5 baby carrots, and 6 oz.", "yogurt per person.", "Serve each person a pouch of KOOL-AID JAMMERS, or an 8 fl oz glass of water with the meal."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1/3 cup mayonnaise", "1/2 cup minced fresh parsley leaves", "2 tablespoons minced fresh tarragon leaves", "fresh lemon juice to taste", "Tabasco to taste", "12 very thin slices of homemade-type white bread", "1 Vidalia onion (available seasonally at specialty produce markets and some supermarkets), sliced very thin"]
recipes.steps: ["In a small bowl stir together the mayonnaise, 1/4 cup of the parsley, the tarragon, the lemon juice, the Tabasco, and salt and pepper to taste.", "Spread one side of the bread slices with the mayonnaise, arrange the onion slices evenly on half the bread slices, and top them with the remaining bread slices.", "Press the sandwiches together gently, trim the crusts, and cut the sandwiches into quarters.", "Put the remaining 1/4 cup parsley in a shallow bowl and dip the edges of the sandwich quarters in the parsley."]

recipes.dish_name: Balsamic Four Onion & Portobello Mushroom Turkey Burgers
recipes.ingredients: ["4 whole Portobello Mushrooms Sliced", "1- 1/2 pound Ground Turkey", "1/2 cups Balsamic Four Onion Spread", "1 teaspoon Salt", "1 teaspoon Pepper", "1 teaspoon Dried Sage", "6 whole Hamburger Buns Or English Muffins", "6 slices Muenster Cheese"]
recipes.steps: ["Preheat a grill pan to medium high heat and mist or brush with olive oil.", "Season portobello mushrooms with salt and pepper and place on the grill.", "Combine ground turkey, four-onion spread, salt, pepper, and dried sage.", "Form into patties, sizing to your preference.", "Place on the grill along with the mushrooms.", "Cook turkey burgers about 5 minutes on each side (depending on size) or until cooked through.", "Once turkey burgers are cooked, remove burgers and mushrooms from grill.", "Toast buns or English muffins on the grill for about 2 minutes.", "Assemble burgers by placing cheese and grilled mushrooms on top."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 stick butter, softened", "1 tbsp. mustard", "1 tbsp. poppy seed", "1 sm. onion, minced fine", "Dash Worcestershire", "Australian Swiss cheese, sliced thin", "Deli ham, sliced thin", "3 Packages Pepperidge Farm pre-baked dinner rolls"]
recipes.steps: ["Mix first five ingredients together.", "Slice dinner rolls in half and spread each side with mix.", "Place slices of cheese on each side and deli ham on one side.", "Place together as a sandwich.", "Chill till ready to serve.", "Bake at 350 degrees for 15 min."]

recipes.dish_name: Gorgonzola and Mache Sandwiches (Tramezzini con Gorgonzola e Gallinella)
recipes.ingredients: ["1/4 pound Italian Gorgonzola cheese, at room temperature", "3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil", "1/4 pound mache (lamb's lettuce), roots trimmed, leaves washed and dried", "8 slices firm-textured white bread, crusts trimmed"]
recipes.steps: ["Put the Gorgonzola in a small bowl and break it into small pieces with a fork.", "Add the olive oil and mash until creamy.", "Put the mache in a bowl.", "Add the creamed Gorgonzola, a little at a time, turning the leaves gently with a fork until evenly coated.", "Mound one-fourth of the mache and Gorgonzola filling in the center of each of 4 slices of bread; top with the other slices.", "Position a sharp knife diagonally across the slice of bread; hold the bread down with your other hand so as not to flatten the filling and quickly slice the sandwich to produce two tramezzini."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 12 lbs turkey breast, ground", "1 (1 ounce) package onion, dry soup mix", "12 black pepper, ground", "12 teaspoon garlic powder", "1 12 tablespoons soy sauce", "1 egg, lightly beaten (optional)", "6 hamburger buns, split"]
recipes.steps: ["In alarge bowl, mix the turkey with the onion soup mix, pepper, garlic powder, soy sauce, and egg.", "Refrigerate the mixture about 10 minutes, then form into 6 patties.", "Preheat the grill for medium-high heat.", "Lightly oil the grill grate.", "Place the patties on the grill.", "Cook for 20 minutes, turning once, or until well done.", "The inside of the burgers will look whitish in color when cooked through.", "Serve on buns."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 flour tortilla (6 inch)", "1 Tbsp. Philadelphia Dips Vegetable Ranch", "1 lettuce leaf", "2 thin slices tomato Safeway 1 lb For $1.29 thru 02/09", "40 g smoked turkey breast, thinly sliced", "1 slice Kraft Singles Fat Free Cheese Slices", "2 slices bacon, cooked, drained Rite Aid 2 For $7.00 thru 02/06"]
recipes.steps: ["Spread tortilla with cream cheese dip.", "Top with lettuce, tomatoes, turkey, Singles and bacon; roll up tightly.", "Serve immediately.", "Or wrap tightly in plastic wrap and refrigerate until ready to serve."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 lb. ground beef", "7-1/2 oz. Mexican chorizo", "6 KRAFT Singles, cut in half Target 2 For $5.00 thru 02/06", "1/2 cup KRAFT Real Mayo Mayonnaise", "3 Tbsp. chopped canned chipotle peppers in adobo sauce", "1 pkg. (12 oz.) Hawaiian dinner rolls, cut horizontally in half"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat grill to medium-high heat.", "Mix ground beef and chorizo; shape into 12 (3-inch) patties.", "Grill 4 min.", "on each side or until done (160 degrees F), topping with Singles for the last minute.", "Meanwhile, mix mayo and peppers.", "Fill rolls with burgers and mayo mixture."]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 leaves Large Romaine Lettuce", "4 slices Roast Turkey (or Your Favorite Lunch Meat)", "2 slices Provolone Cheese (or Your Favorite Cheese)", "1 Tablespoon Favorite Condiments (Miracle Whip, Mustard Etc.)"]
recipes.steps: ["Lay romaine lettuce leaf down on a plate.", "Spread your favorite condiment on the leaf.", "I use Miracle Whip and mustard.", "Place a slice of cheese down and then two slices of your lunch meat.", "Roll.", "Repeat above.", "Then eat a quick and easy lunch."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 lb lean ground beef", "1 egg, beaten", "1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce", "1 teaspoon Tabasco sauce (Original Red Sauce)", "1 (5 ounce) packageboursin or herbed chevre cheese"]
recipes.steps: ["Combine ground beef, egg, Worcestershire, and Tabasco Sauce in a medium bowl and mix well.", "Divide into five portions.", "Form three-quarters of each portion into a patty.", "Make an indentation in the center of each patty and fill with 2 tablespoons cheese; cover cheese with remaining quarter of meat and form into a finished patty.", "Preheat broiler.", "Broil burgers 3 to 5 minutes on each side or to desired doneness."]

recipes.ingredients: ["34 lb ground turkey", "2 green onions, chopped", "1 tablespoon reduced sodium soy sauce", "1 tablespoon ketchup", "14 teaspoon garlic powder", "14 teaspoon black pepper", "13 cup monterey jack cheese", "4 slices turkey bacon", "4 hamburger buns, split and toasted", "1 tomatoes, sliced"]
recipes.steps: ["COOK BACON SEPARATELY AND SET ASIDE.", "Mix together turkey,onion,soy,ketchup,garlic,pepper and cheese.", "Mix together and form into patties.", "Grill or fry in pan.", "Put on bun add 1 strip bacon and slice of tomato.", "(I add about 1 T. lite Hidden Valley salad dressing on my bun)."]

recipes.dish_name: Firecracker Burgers with Cooling Lime Sauce
recipes.ingredients: ["1 1/2 pounds lean ground beef", "6 sesame seed sandwich rolls, split, toasted", "1 cup watercress or mixed spring greens", "Seasoning:", "1 tablespoon curry powder", "1 tablespoon Caribbean jerk seasoning", "1 teaspoon salt", "Sauce:", "1/2 cup reduced-fat mayonnaise", "1/4 cup low-fat plain yogurt", "1 tablespoon fresh lime juice", "2 teaspoons grated lime peel", "1/4 teaspoon salt"]
recipes.steps: ["Combine Ground Beef and seasoning ingredients in large bowl, mixing lightly but thoroughly.", "Shape into six 1/2-inch thick patties.", "Place patties on grid over medium, ash-covered coals.", "Grill, covered, 8 to 10 minutes (over medium heat on preheated gas grill, 7 to 9 minutes) until instant-read thermometer inserted horizontally into center registers 160 degrees F, turning occasionally.", "Meanwhile, combine sauce ingredients in small bowl; set aside.", "Spread sauce on cut sides of rolls.", "Place one burger on bottom half of each roll; top evenly with watercress.", "Close sandwiches."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 cup chunky peanut butter", "13 cup granola cereal, crushed", "12 cup salted peanuts, chopped", "1 tablespoon butter, softened", "2 tablespoons honey, whipped", "4 (8 inch) whole wheat tortillas"]
recipes.steps: ["In medium bowl, combine all ingredients except tortillas and blend well.", "Divide mixture among the tortillas and spread to edges.", "roll up tortillas, enclosing the filling.", "Cut sandwiches in half crosswise, then place in ziploc bags, label, and freeze.", "To thaw: Let thaw in refrigerator overnight.", "Or place frozen in lunchboxes in the morning and let thaw.", "Make sure the sandwiches are eaten at lunch when thawed."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 lb. ground beef Safeway 1 lb For $3.99 thru 02/09", "1 pkg. (1-1/4 oz.) taco seasoning mix", "1/4 cup PHILADELPHIA Chive & Onion Cream Cheese Spread", "1/3 cup KRAFT Shredded Cheddar Cheese", "4 hamburger buns, lightly toasted", "1/2 cup salsa", "1 avocado, cut into 8 slices Target 10 ea For $10.00 thru 02/06"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat grill to medium heat.", "Mix meat and seasoning mix; shape into 8 thin patties.", "Mix cream cheese spread and shredded cheese; spoon about 2 Tbsp.", "onto center of each of 4 patties.", "Top with remaining patties; pinch edges together to seal.", "Grill 7 to 9 min.", "on each side or until burgers are done (160F.)", "Fill buns with burgers, salsa and avocados."]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 pieces white bread", "1/2 cup grated Cheddar", "1/4 cup kimchi, drained and coarsely chopped", "2 tablespoons mayonnaise"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat a cast-iron skillet over medium heat.", "Top 1 piece of bread with 1/4 cup grated Cheddar, kimchi, the remaining 1/4 cup grated Cheddar, and then the other slice of bread.", "Spread 1 tablespoon mayonnaise over the top slice, then add to the skillet mayonnaise-side down and cook for 3 minutes, pressing slightly to flatten.", "Spread the remaining 1 tablespoon mayonnaise on the top slice of bread, flip, and cook until golden, another 3 minutes.", "Quarter the sandwich and serve."]

recipes.dish_name: Grilled Burgers with Argentinean Parsley Sauce
recipes.ingredients: ["3 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley", "2 tablespoons olive oil", "1 tablespoon red wine vinegar", "1 large garlic clove, chopped", "1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper", "1/4 teaspoon dried oregano", "12 ounces lean ground beef", "1/2 teaspoon salt"]
recipes.steps: ["Prepare barbecue (medium-high heat).", "Whisk parsley, olive oil, vinegar, garlic, 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper and oregano in small bowl to blend.", "Season sauce to taste with salt.", "Combine beef, 1/2 teaspoon salt and remaining 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper in medium bowl; blend well.", "Shape beef into two 1-inch-thick patties.", "Grill beef until cooked to desired doneness, about 5 minutes per side for medium-rare.", "Transfer beef to plates.", "Spoon sauce over and serve."]

recipes.ingredients: ["12 cup salsa, divided", "14 cup shredded reduced-fat cheddar cheese", "3 teaspoons paprika", "1 teaspoon dried oregano", "1 teaspoon ground cumin", "34 teaspoon sugar", "34 teaspoon garlic powder", "12 teaspoon dried thyme", "14 teaspoon salt", "14 teaspoon cayenne pepper", "1 lb extra-lean ground turkey", "14 cup reduced-fat sour cream", "4 hamburger buns, split", "12 cup torn curly endive lettuce", "1 medium tomatoes, chopped"]
recipes.steps: ["In a large bowl, combine 1/4 cup salsa, cheese, paprika, oregano, cumin, sugar, garlic powder, thyme, salt and cayenne.", "Crumble turkey over mixture and mix well.", "Shape into four burgers.", "If grilling the burgers, coat grill rack with cooking spray before starting the grill.", "Grill, covered, over medium heat or broil 4 inches from the heat for 5-7 minutes on each side or until a meat thermometer reads 165 and juices run clear.", "In a small bowl, combine sour cream and remaining salsa.", "Place burgers on buns; top with endive, tomato and sour cream mixture."]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 lbs ground beef", "1 bunch scallion, chopped", "1 lemon, zest of", "3 tablespoons tomato paste", "2 -3 garlic cloves, minced", "1 tablespoon brown sugar", "1 tablespoon soy sauce", "3 -4 teaspoons chili powder", "1 tablespoon Dijon mustard", "12 teaspoon black pepper", "1 12 teaspoons kosher salt"]
recipes.steps: ["Add all ingredients, except salt, to a large bowl.", "Combine ingredients by lightly folding with fingers.", "Shape into 6-8 patties, sprinkle both sides with salt and grill or pan fry until juices run clear when pierced with a fork."]

recipes.ingredients: ["4 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, plus more for brushing", "9 slices olive bread, lightly toasted", "2 cloves garlic, crushed", "1/4 cup sliced almonds", "1/2 cup chopped jarred roasted red peppers", "1 tablespoon sherry vinegar or red wine vinegar", "1 teaspoon smoked paprika", "Kosher salt", "1 1/2 pounds ground lamb or beef chuck", "2 shallots, finely grated (about 1/4 cup)", "4 slices manchego cheese", "Lettuce leaves, for serving"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.", "Remove the crust from 1 slice bread and tear the bread into 1-inch pieces.", "Add to the skillet along with the garlic and cook until golden brown, about 2 minutes.", "Add the almonds and cook until golden, about 3 minutes.", "Transfer to a mini food processor or blender along with the roasted peppers, vinegar, the remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1/2 teaspoon paprika and 1/4 teaspoon salt.", "Pulse until slightly chunky.", "Gently mix the ground meat, shallots, 1 teaspoon salt and the remaining 1/2 teaspoon paprika in a bowl with your hands until just combined.", "Form into four 1-inch-thick patties.", "Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat.", "Brush with olive oil, then add the patties and cook until browned on the bottom, 4 to 5 minutes.", "Flip and top the patties with cheese; cook 4 to 5 more minutes.", "Spread the roasted pepper sauce on the remaining 8 slices bread.", "Serve the burgers on the bread with lettuce.", "Per serving: Calories 885; Fat 54 g (Saturated 20 g); Cholesterol 131 mg; Sodium 1,647 mg; Carbohydrate 50 g; Fiber 3 g; Protein 46 g", "Photograph by Antonis Achilleos"]

recipes.steps: ["Spread a layer of mayonnaise on each slice of bread.", "Pile on half the turkey, two slices of perfectly cooked bacon, two slices of tomato, and two lettuce leaves.", "Top with second slice of bread.", "Repeat step 2.", "Add last slice of bread, slice into halves or quarters (securing with toothpicks if necessary), and serve with fries, cole slaw, or potato salad."]

recipes.dish_name: Two Tone Peanut Butter & Apple Sandwich
recipes.ingredients: ["1 slice white bread", "1 slice whole wheat bread", "2 Tbsp. creamy peanut butter, divided", "2 thin apple slices King Sooper's 1 lb For $0.87 thru 02/09", "1/4 cup JET-PUFFED Miniature Marshmallows"]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 lb extra lean ground beef (ground round)", "2 garlic cloves, minced", "12 cup finely chopped mushroom", "2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce", "14 teaspoon fresh ground black pepper", "4 whole grain buns, split", "lettuce leaves or spinach leaves", "tomatoes, slices", "onion, slices", "pickle", "mustard", "ketchup"]
recipes.steps: ["Preheat greased barbecue grill to medium-high heat.", "In a large bowl, combine beef, garlic, mushrooms, Worcestershire rauce and pepper.", "Shape into 4 equal patties, about 3/4 inch thick.", "Place burgers on preheated grill, close lid, and grill, turning once, for 4-6 minutes per side or until an instant-read thermometer registers 160 degrees.", "Serve in buns with desired toppings."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 34 lbs lean ground beef", "1 12 teaspoons salt", "14 teaspoon ground black pepper", "2 tablespoons smoky tomato barbecue sauce", "1 tablespoon mayonnaise", "1 tablespoon dijon-style mustard", "4 slices sharp cheddar cheese", "4 slices swiss cheese", "4 large hamburger buns, split in 1/2 and toasted"]
recipes.steps: ["Mix beef, salt and pepper.", "Divide mixture into quarters, then divide each quarter in 1/2.", "Pat each portion out on wax paper to about 4 1/2\" in diameter Combine barbecue sauce, mayonnaise and mustard.", "Spread 4 of the patties with this mixture, dividing evenly among patties.", "Top each of the sauced patties with a slice of Cheddar and a slice of Swiss.", "Cover filled patties with remaining patties-pinch edges to seal.", "Press out any air bubbles.", "Make sure cheese is sealed inside.", "Refrigerate, to grill later or can grill immediately.", "Can be grilled indoors or outdoors, or broiled in conventional stove.", "If broiled, place patties about 6\" from heat source and broil approximately 6 to 8 minutes per side.", "If grilled, cook to desired doneness, approximately 8 to 10 minutes per side.", "Place on hamburger buns and serve and enjoy!"]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 loaf Focaccia Bread", "2 Tablespoons Butter - For Your Griddle", "1/2 jars Olive Tapenade, 3 Ounce Jar", "1/2 cups Sun Dried Tomatoes", "3 slices Provolone Cheese", "4 slices Cooked Bacon", "4 slices Turkey Or Ham", "1 cup Basil Leaves"]
recipes.steps: ["Slice focaccia bread lengthwise into two large rectangular slices.", "Toast insides on a buttered griddle.", "Remove and layer as much of the ingredients as you like on the bottom half.", "Be generous on the olive tapenade and basil leaves.", "Top with the other focaccia half.", "Cut into sandwiches."]

recipes.ingredients: ["4 Chikuwa", "2 pieces Cream cheese blocks", "4 Thinly sliced pork", "1/2 tbsp Sugar", "1 1/2 tbsp Soy sauce", "1 1/2 tbsp Mirin"]
recipes.steps: ["Cut the cheese into 4 equal length strips and tuck them inside the chikuwa.", "Wrap the pork around the chikuwa.", "Cut each piece in half.", "Combine the ingredients.", "In a pan, heat 1 tablespoon oil.", "Place the wraps in the pan and fry until the meat is browned.", "Glaze by adding the liquid mixture from Step 1, and cook until shiny.", "They're great as the main dish in bentos."]

recipes.ingredients: ["6 tablespoons couscous (whole-wheat if available)", "12 cup boiling water", "2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil", "1 small onion, diced", "1 stalk celery, diced", "1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme", "1 12 teaspoons chopped fresh sage", "12 teaspoon salt", "12 teaspoon fresh ground pepper", "14 cup dried cranberries", "1 lb 93% lean ground turkey"]
recipes.steps: ["Place couscous in a large bowl.", "Pour in boiling water, stir and set aside until the water is absorbed, about 5 minutes.", "Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat.", "Add onion and cook, stirring, for 1 minute.", "Add celery and cook, stirring, until softened, about 3 minutes.", "Add thyme, sage, salt and pepper; cook until fragrant, about 20 seconds more.", "Transfer the mixture to the bowl with the couscous, add cranberries and stir to combine.", "Let cool for 5 minutes.", "Add turkey and stir until combined; do not overmix.", "Form the mixture into 6 patties.", "Coat a large nonstick skillet, preferably cast-iron, with cooking spray and set over medium-high heat for 2 minutes.", "Add the patties, reduce heat to medium, and cook for 4 minutes.", "Turn gently to avoid breakage, and cook on the other side for 2 minutes.", "Cover and continue to cook until lightly browned but still juicy (the juices should run clear, not pink), about 4 minutes more.", "(An instant-read thermometer inserted in the center should read 165 F.)."]

recipes.dish_name: New York Burger Week: Pretzel Burger with Beer Cheese
recipes.ingredients: ["2 tablespoons unsalted butter", "2 tablespoons all-purpose flour", "1/2 bottle Amstel light", "4 ounces sharp cheddar, shredded", "1/2 teaspoon Dijon mustard", "dash of hot sauce (optional)", "2 large onions, thinly sliced into rings", "2 tablespoons unsalted butter", "1/2 cup Amstel light", "Salt and pepper", "2 burger patties cooked to your liking", "2 pretzel buns"]
recipes.steps: ["Melt butter in a small sauce pan over medium-low heat", "When it bubbles and foams, add the flour and whisk together to form a paste.", "Cook, whisking constantly, until the mixture turns from white to light tan.", "Gradually whisk in the beer and slowly add the cheese, continuing to whisk until you have a thick cheese sauce.", "Stir in hot sauce if using.", "Remove from heat and set aside until ready to use (you may have to reheat it to top the burger)."]

recipes.steps: ["Chop up veggies and mix in bowl.", "Add Soy Sauce, Jerk Sauce (or chopped Ginger), Wasabi, Bread Crumbs, and Egg yolk.", "Mix together.", "Add ground turkey and mix.", "Grease pan and bring to medium heat.", "Take Turkey mixture and make pattys about the size of your palm.", "Turkey pattys do not swell up like beef pattys so keep that in mind.", "Cook on both sides approximately 2-3 minutes each side depending on your stove top.", "Remove patty from heat and place o bun, top it off with cheese if you'd like.", "Add lettuce and pineapple.", "Enjoy!"]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 cups lentils", "1 teaspoon salt", "1 teaspoon oil", "3 onions", "1 small green chili pepper", "1 garlic clove", "coriander seeds or ground coriander", "clove", "cinnamon", "ginger", "poppy seed", "1 teaspoon cumin", "18 teaspoon turmeric"]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 14-ounce can artichoke hearts, drained and finely chopped", "5 ounces feta cheese, crumbled", "3/4 cup mayonnaise", "1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese", "1 2-ounce jar pimientos, drained and diced", "2 teaspoons minced garlic", "Pita chips or Melba toast, for dipping"]
